11222.content:
Way skinny and beautiful.

Out of the two of them, Ino was the only one who was a certified shinobi, meaning that of the two of them Ino was the only one who got any sort of extreme training to keep that trim body of her's so...well, trim. It was her who suggested that Sakura join the Ninja Academy when they were kids, the only difference between them at the time being dedication and follow-through. Sakura found it far too difficult to continue and eventually pulled herself out of the academy when she was still young where Ino went on to graduate and eventually become a chunin.

It was a little unsettling for Sakura to be around Ino sometimes, being that they were so different and led such different lives. She got to be close to hotties like Sasuke before he mysteriously disappeared, and that new guy she'd seen around the village; Sai. Whereas she led a simple existance about town, stepping out only to go shopping with her friends or pick up some groceries. But other than that, they were really close.

"Hey Billboard Brow!" Ino teased as she sauntered up to the pinkheaded porker, long blonde ponytail flapping in the breeze, "Long time no see, Hokage says I'm free today, wanna grab lunch?"

But whereas Ino had emerged with grace and dignity, if not a little loudly, Sakura's lifestyle had prevented her from doing so. While she was a pretty girl, refined and intelligent, Sakura's girth kept her from doing a lot of things. Like walking long distances and jogging. From the mere twenty feet from her house to here, Sakura's expanse had grown a little tired of the hot Konoha sun. Underneath her pillowy upperarms, she had started to sweat a little, and her round cheeks had appled with exertion. Her breasts bobbed up and down as she struggled to catch her breath to voice a breathy, "You're buying Ino-pig!"

And so Ino stopped walking to allow her horizontally generous friend time to catch up with her, turning around and leading the tubby girl to some sustenance. "Geez Sakura, sweaty much?" she asked, noticing how much persperation was dripping from underneath her pink hair. "Oh yeah, my bad, it's hot today!" she lifted one meaty arm to wipe the sweat from her brow and let it fall back down uselessly to her side, sending a tidal wave through her adiposity. "Uh-huh, I'm sure that's it." Ino said as she eyed Sakura's gut, bulging from underneath her red top, "Don't you need muscles to wear a muscle shirt?" she teased, pinching some of the jiggly flab that caked itself around Sakura's upperarm.

"Shut up Ino!" Sakura turned bright red as she pulled her fat away from her pinchy friend, "Quit pinching me!" the blond giggled, "Oh whatever, Sakura, where're we eating?" the pinkheaded girl looked around until she spied her favorite spot, "The BBQ restraunt, again?" Ino sighed, "Geez, it's like I'm eating with Choji."

"And what's that supposed to mean?" Sakura huffed, puffing out her breasts and placing her hands on her generously padded hips, "Tenten eats here all the time too!" Ino snorted, "Sh'yeah, and have you seen the size of that girl?" Sakura looked down, "Good point... okay, is there some kind of salad place around?"

The blond shinobi giggled, "Of course the only restraunt you don't know is one that serves salads!" Ino teased her again by slapping her across the pale upperarm, making it jiggle wildly, "It's cool with me, I don't mind eating barbecue again- but just this once, next time I get to pick!"

"Yum!" Sakura's belly rumbled loudly as she headed towards the restraunt, forgetting the heavy late breakfast she had already consumed with her family. "Hey, wait up!" Ino grumbled, chasing after her hunger-crazed friend, "Geez, now you decide to pump those leg muscles?!"

112221221.content:
"Deal!" the Yamanka girl readily agreed, "After all, once you guys win that eating contest all the food I've gotta buy for you will seem like a drop in the bucket!"

Ino was carried away by fantasies of brand-name clothing, expensive jewelry, and custom-made shinobi clothes so extravagant and beautiful that all eyes would be on her during missions! All that money, even split three ways which was quite a paycut, was surely enough to fund all her dreams of posh dresses and nice things... if only for a little while. But above everything else that was so totally awesome with this plan: she wouldn't have to give up her girlsish figure! She could just watch these fat girls eat themselves silly and a considerable amount of the rewards for herself!

"Alright, so how are we going to go about doing this anyway?" Tenten asked the brains of the operation, "I mean, do we train or what. because I'm not really too good with training... or running." Ino grimaced, "I-I don't know, I guess you two just stuff your faces until the contest, like that's not all either of you do anyway." she said haughtily, raising her nose at the bun-haired fatty, "Just practice eating a lot more and you should be fine!"

"Yeah, I guess that'll work." Tenten didn't look too convinced, scratching her head with one of those chubby fingers of hers...

However, out of all three of them, Sakura seemed to be the only one having doubts. If there was one thing to Sakura Haruno, it was insecurity. The kind that only comes when you're a morbidly obese sixteen year-old girl with a pretty popular friend. She didn't quite like the idea of the whole village (or at least attending party, which may as well have been the whole village in her eyes) eyeballing her while she stuffed herself. She looked down at her ginormous body, what she could see of her belly bunching up into rolling collections of fat underneath her simple casual tank top. Her spare tire was clearly distinctive, she could feel it as she self-consciously ran her hands down her body.

"I-I don't think we should do this!" Sakura exclaimed worriedly

"What?" Tenten asked in a concerned tone, "Why?"

"Yeah, why?" Ino barked flatly, not at all pleased at the thought of her dreams being crushed by Sakura's dumb excuses.

Quickly, Sakura wove up a simple fabrication, one that didn't make her sound like a big baby. "I mean, you said Shizune-sama and Kurenai-san were going to be competing right?" the pink headed porker gesticulated towards the barbecue hut behind them, "And they're big, way bigger than me- maybe even bigger than Tenten" here Tenten turned bright red "And I don't think there's any way we can compete with those two alone, forget about the rest of the competition!"

Ino narrowed her eyes, "You just don't wanna look like a fatass in front of the whole village."

"That's not it at all!" however, Inner Sakura had to comment on Ino's shrewdness, "I just don't think we can win!"

Ino sauntered over and leaned on one of Sakura's well padded shoulders, "Oh relax Billboard Butt, from what I gathered from the twin wonders of blubber back there, we've got a whole month to prepare!" she slapped Sakura's proclaimed "billboard butt" for emphasis, "And Tenten's just as big as they are, it doesn't matter who wins, we'll all split it the same way right?"

Sakura could only nod, her fears not completely put to rest.

"Hey, I'm not THAT fat!" Tenten grumbled, "And if you want to win so badly, why aren't you competing?!"

Ino gulped, having been caught in the metaphorical headlights, "I-I'm your manager! Yeah, that's it!" she lied, "And besides, I'm a ninja unlike you two fatsos, I'd never have enough time to bulk up enough... well, ever, let alone between missions!"

Tenten narrowed her eyes, "Yeah, whatever, come on, I'm still hungry."

As her two friends receded back into the barbecue hut, Sakura was left to herself. Left to contemplate on what she had just agreed to do. Her hands traveled to her soft, squishy gut that hung from her waistline. She squeezed it remorsefully, "Oh man... this is so not good." was all she could muster. She was going to make a total pig out of herself. And for what, money?!

...actually, not that bad of a trade-off, considering her already substantial head start. And after all, how much weight could she possibly gain in a month anyway?

"Um, sure." Ino said walking into the room. She found that it was a changing room, and within was a single pink one piece, much like a bathing suit, with a curly tail on the back as well as a hairband with fake ears on it. Ino was annoyed by the fact that she was being forced to wear the ensemble.

A moment later the waitress appeared. "Are you ready to change ma'am?"

"No I am not!" Ino yelled angrily, shaking the outfit for emphasis. "What the hell is your idea having me wear this?"

"Well, many of our less-than-honorable patrons have no problem refusing to pay or do dishes and just stuffing themselves silly, so our manager has decided that our customers would be less inclined to do so if an example was made of them. Therefore while eating a meal that one hasn't paid for, you and anyone else who refuses to pay or can't pay are required to wear this while dining or wear this for life."

Ino rolled her eyes. "And how are you going to do that?"

"Those stamps are curse marks that transform the wearer's clothing. It won't come off until conditions are met. The choice is your, but the dishes option is out."

In the end, a frustrated Ino had no choice but to accept.

Blushing even harder, Ino looked at the remaining food. Ice cream and a number of bowls of it at that.

Still, she gripped her spoon and dug in once more.

This time it only took her forty minutes to finish the last bit of food.

All the plates were cleared, nothing but crumbs and emptiness remaining on them.

Ino was bloated beyond belief but still wore a shaky smile as the waitress collected her meal and removed the marks on the back of her hand.

"Impressive. Maybe you should enter the eating contest as well," the waitress said.

Helped to her feet by Tenten and Sakura, Ino thought over what the waitress had said as they left the restaurant.

On the walk home, both her friends congratulated Ino on how much she ate.

"That was incredible!" Sakura said, patting her friend on the back.

"URRRRP! Thanks..." Ino muttered, embarrassed though glad for the release of gas as it made the ache in her stomach lessen.

"Yeah, you really should join us in the contest. We can help you get in shape, so to speak, for it," Tenten said.

Ino placed her hands on her swollen belly, rubbing it slowly.

Looking at it and then to her friends, Ino replied...
112221221111.title: She finishes despite a few stares, and consider...

choices: Ino realized that she felt something during that hug
One of the guys ran into her.
1122212211111.content:
"I guess it couldn't hurt." Ino said absently. She didn't really intend on eating too much, but she remembered how good it felt to let go of her diet. It made her at least consider just pigging out more often.

Of course this news made Sakura and Tenten feel ecstatic, after all even though they were fiends with Ino they always felt that they had grown apart from her after she became a ninja.

"Oh this is great, welcome to the team Ino!" Tenten said hugging Ino tightly, folds of flesh engulfing Ino's slimmer body. Sakura then joined in, pretty much the combined body mass was covering Ino entirely.

"We should definitely have a party to celebrate!" Sakra cheered happily.

"Yeah!" Tenten agreed, "Let's go!"

And with that the large teens ran off, leaving Ino behind. As she walked after them...
1122212211111.title: "I'll...do it." Ino joined the party!

choices: Sakura invites Tenten and Ino over to pig out at her house.
Sakura and Tenten ask Tsunade and Shizune for help in fattening up Ino.
11222122111111.content:
Ino carefully observed the jiggling waves of blubber that both Sakura and Tenten possessed and recalled the hug a moment earlier.

Being surrounded by all that warm fat, the heat radiating from those huge bodies into her skinny frame...it ignited a different heat in her stomach, causing Ino's eyes to widen.

She wasn't a lesbian, she had never thought of Sakura and Tenten in that way, but that fat, all that weight pressing around her...

Was that what it was to be fat?

If so, she couldn't wait to find out.

She moved closer to Tenten and Sakura as they walked, Ino wrapping an arm around both of their wide middles, squeezing a fistful of blubber in each hand.

Yes, things were going to be very interesting, Ino thought.

But first she had to go to bed.

After saying goodbye to Tenten and Sakura, Ino observed her own mother's fat body. Of course Ino's mother wasn't the size of Tenten or Sakura but at three hundred and eight pounds she certainly was fat. For a moment she thought about telling her mother about her newfound interest in fat but decided not to.

Rest was more important.

The next day...
11222122111111.title: Ino realized that she felt something during tha...

choices: So she can compete in the eating contest
So she'll have more in common with Choji
112221221111112.content:
The next day at the Hokage's office, Sakura and Tenten were visiting Lady Tsunade.

Both would-be kunoichi were outside the office carrying the usual load of food for whenever they visited the Hokage...Enough to fill three large refridgerators.

Unlike most regular citizens, Sakura and Tenten were close friends of the Debukage and aspired to be like her. Tsunade knew this of course and let them visit often to learn about her habits.

Today when they came in, led by Shizune, there was a female Anbu wearing a wolf mask. Instantly Tenten and Sakura knew who it was.

"Hi Tsunade, Hinata, what are you two up to?" Tenten asked curiously.

Instantly Hinata undid her mask and shushed Tenten. "Tenten, you know I'm supposed to use my codename now that I'm an anbu!"

Tenten gasped. "Oh right, sorry about that."

Then the barely mobile mass of lard known as Tsunade spoke up. "Well 'Nodoka' and I were discussing battle techniques. As my apprentice she needs to remember the rules of battle for medical shinobi...Anyway what brings you girls here so early? We usually don't eat until three."

"Well Tsunade, we need you and Shizune to help us fatten up Ino." Sakura said as she set out the food. Quickly Shizune and the normal sized Hinata passeed it out.

"Sure, but why?" Tsunade asked.
112221221111112.title: Sakura and Tenten ask Tsunade and Shizune for h...

choices: A few days later, the buffet trick is pulled on Ino...
During lunch, Tenten and Sakura try to outeat Tsunade and Shizune.
1122212211111121.content:
Tsunade grinned at Tenten and Sakura's answer.

"So she finally decided to gain some weight huh? Good for her!" Tsunade then remembered when she had been that age, deciding to gain weight, the nightly binges that followed, her first hundred pounds, but Shizune soon noticed the distracted look on her lady's face and brought Tsunade back to the present moment. "Well there are ways for people to gain a lot of weight fast but nothing like a hundred pounds in a day or something that ridiculous. At the most we could probably pull off a fifty pound gain, given Ino's skinny body. She'll need to stretch her stomach out and eat a lot more."

Tenten and Sakura nodded, taking notes as fast as they could.

"We'll pull the old buffet trick. You remember that, don't you Shizune?" Tsuande said.

Shizune blushed at the memory, nodding. The buffet trick had been used back when Shizune had been skinny, five or six years ago. Tsunade had used the buffet's all you can eat policy to stuff Shizune, causing the assistant's inner glutton to awaken and setting her on the fattening path.

Tsunade rubbed her big belly and smiled.

"Alright girls, make sure Ino is at the buffet near the ramen stand. Shizune and I will be joining you to make sure Ino's getting the right kind of food, got it?"

Both fat young women nodded.

"Great! Now let's eat!"
1122212211111121.title: So she can compete in the eating contest

choices: Sakura and Tenten continue Ino's Training Method for the whole month...
Meanwhile, Tenten's night is going swimmingly. She just LOVES all this food!
1122212212.content:
And so it was decided that Sakura and Tenten were to be roped into yet another one of Ino's crazy schemes. This time, however, things would be different. No matter what the three girls tried to do together in the past, it all just seemed to blow up in their faces. But this time, the cards were in her favor. The competition was in her court, and there was nary a chance that she could lose (except maybe to Tenten, but either way, she still gets paid.) But on the flip side of that, there was no way she could lose thanks to becoming such a fatty; instead of becoming a ninja like Ino. It was embarrassing. But thankfully for Ino and her get-rich-quick scheme, whenever Sakura was upset, she ate.

"Another serving dear?" her mother asked politely from the head of the table, not waiting for an answer before plopping down another industrial-sized serving of chicken and drenching it with barbecue sauce, "You sure do seem to have a healthy appetite tonight."

Sakura was nonresponsive, she simply continued her feasting without even acknowledging that something new had been put in front of her to gnaw on. Full of chicken, rice, and sauce, her chubby cheeks bulged outwards at their capacity. She swallowed, the swelling went down, and she repeated the process. Her green eyes had glazed, the natural habits acquired over nearly an entire lifetime of hedonism and sloth taking over. Her heavy upper half leaned in over the table in an effort to get the food to her mouth faster. However, her soft body's leaning was cut short by her boobs cutting into the table, meaning that she would have to hunch over her plate and guard it from her parents with a barricade made of her soft forearms. She took deep breaths inbetween big bites, looking very much like a savage animal in her food lust.

Beneath her, the pale dome of her belly had filled as well. The contents of her devoured plates still sat heavily between her legs, pushing out her padded stomach further than ever. It bulged our from her muscle shirt, the lowermost roll clearly exposed should one drop a fork underneath the table. It rested on her doughy lap for as long as it could, but the last two plates pushed it's swollen taut form past her knees; making it dreadfully uncomfortable to support with her legs, so she subconsciously spread her legs far enough to alleviate some discomfort. However uncomfortable she may be, she may just as well have been twice as "hungry"

Her father chuckled, "Now now, slow down honey, save some for your mother and me!" he said in a teasing manner.

But it was no use, Sakura was long gone. Only Inner Sakura and her dissatisfaction at being so fat remained; oddly enough fueling her to eat more and more until the hurt went away. She grunted dumbly as she tried to stuff more and more food down her throat, like an animal unknown to it's own limitations, until finally there was simply no more food left!

"Ohh..." Sakura moaned, leaning back in her chair as she digest. Her soft, creamy backfat enveloped the back of her seat, and her blubbery rear spilled from the sides as her overall bulk bent the legs. She dare not touch her stomach, it was far too taut and sore for anything that required touching. She would just sit here all night until this pain went away. "I am... hic... never eating again..." she said aloud, completely oblivious to the watching audience of her parents.

Her mother turned to her father, and back to her daughter with a concerned look on her cherubic face, "Honey, is there something the matter?" she began sympathetically- until she was caught off guard by the loud splintering of wood. Sakura's body was sent tumbling to the floor, landing on her padded rear and letting out a weak moan of pain.

"No..." she mustered weakly, "I'm... fine... ouch..."
1122212212.title: Stretch that Tummy!

choices: The next morning, we find Ino trying to practice eating...With poor results
Skip to the day of the contest
11222122122.content:
At her home, Tenten was sitting at her own table trying to hold herself back from prematurely devouring every scrap of food at her table.

In preparation for the eating contest she had made a baker's dozen dishes of all of her favorite meals as well as ordered twelve bowls of ramen from Ichiraku and some special barbeque.

Right now she was staring down a plate of shrimp fried rice, eager to consume the food and please her voracious tummy, but she had to wait for the rolls she had hand made to finish baking. It would be a whole agonizing two minutes before the bread was done and Tenten could drench it in some sweet butter, enhancing the taste of the baked goods....Oh that taste!

Unlike Sakura, Tenten found sheer joy in food. She loved eatingit, and making it, but tasting it was on a whole other level. She loved the textures of ramen as it slithered across her tongue, the sweetness of dumplings, the burst of flavor every bubble of fat on a piece of pork gave her. She was going to take her time on this meal all right.

Just then the timer went off and her bread was finished.

Eagerly, Tenten struggled out of her chair and on to her mountainous thighs, waddling to the oven and retrieving her last part of her feast.

Once it was done being buttered she sat down, uttered a hasty prayer, and took bite after bite of the bread, taking in it's warm, fluffy goodness before slurping down the savory ramen noisily, entering euphoria. She grew more and more delighted as each meal went into her maw and put her taste buds into ecstasy before being gobbled down.

Before fifteen minutes were up, the brunette had consumed everything and was completely satisfied, rubbing her round expanse of flesh called a belly.

"Mmm...That was great~♪!" She said quietly to herself as she closed her eyes and enjoyed the lingering aftertastes on her tongue.
11222122122.title: Meanwhile, Tenten's night is going swimming...

choices: "Tenten has already eats a ton, so you wouldn't have far to go. I'd pick her."
"Sure, Tenten's huge. But Sakura has way more potential. Go with her."
112221221221.content:
"Give her another," said Choji Akimichi.

"Didn't that last one nearly kill her?" deadpanned the ever pessimistic Shikamaru Nara, "I mean, all things considered, we should just be amazed she made it this far and call it a day."

Shaking his head, Choji placed another stick of dumplings into Ino's hand, the blonde kunoichi moaning and whining as she raised her arm.

"Come on, Ino, you're almost there," Choji cheered.

"Urp. ..." Slowly, agonizingly, Ino chewed the first few bites. With painstaking caution, piece by piece she popped the dumplings into her tentative mouth.

"She won't make it," Shikamaru chimed in.

"Ohhh..." Her pale stomach had begun burbling. Ino had made a mistake; she knew it. She had overestimated her body's limits, had pushed herself too far. And was going to pay the price.

"Don't listen to him, you're doing great!"

"You know that she got those dumplings from your house, right?"

"M-my...?" The bulky young man abruptly straightened up, his jaw going slack. His best friend said nothing, though did grant himself a rare grin as he allowed that information to process.

"Ino, that's way too much!" Choji exclaimed finally, "Stop before you hurt yourself! "

Team InoShikaCho sat together in Ino's family's dining room. The night before, Ino had talked to her longtime allies about her latest get-rich-quick scheme. As she waited for admiration towards her cunning, however, both Choji and Shikamaru quickly realized the rather glaring flaw in her "foolproof" plan; she was sending two amateurs, undeniable gluttons, no doubt, but still amateurs into a competition of seasoned eaters.

As Choji stated, Tsunade had been glutting herself beyond reasonable limits for years and, as Shikamaru stated, the massive med-ninja had been to the point of bursting more times than Kiba had woken up in dog urine. If Ino was to win, had to increase her chances of winning somehow. Unfortunately, both for Ino's now taut belly and Shikamaru's budding headache, Ino's solution for the amateurs vs veterans dilemma was to add another amateur.

Which was why her teammates were sitting with her, watching her strain with dozens of sweet confections that she had previously denied herself of.

"Ugh!" she finally groaned, laying a hand on her belly. She'd been at it all morning. The blonde kunoichi was so full, she was out of breath, "That's.... it! I'm done. Shikamaru, how many... urp... was that...?"

"Two sticks," Shikamaru deadpanned

"Two??"

"An anorexic butterfly could've done better."

Ino gritted her teeth. A lifetime of dieting had severely limited the amount her stomach could handle. She thought she was doing good, but in reality, most people ate more for dessert every night.

"Dammit!" she exclaimed as she shot to her feet, her rage overcoming her full belly, "How in hell am I going to win if I can barely stomach two freaking sticks of dumplings?"

"Why do you wanna get fat anyway?" Choji asked curiously. Already knowing the what her reaction would be, Shikamaru leisurely leaned back in his seat, closing his eyes to wait for the storm to blow over.

"I don't 'wanna get fat'," Ino snapped. Perhaps it was a little harsh, but she did not enjoy being questioned, especially when she was in such gastronomic turmoil, "Why would I want to be fat? So I could be like Sakura? Like that pig Tenten? Is that what you're saying??" She advanced on Choji and, even though he stood over her by almost half a foot, he cowered in her wake, "What I want is the obscene amounts of cash they'd pay me for doing so! With that much money, I could pay to be thin if I wanted! If that isn't worth it, I don't know what is. But, unfortunately, I'm - not - a - gluttonous - pig!"

"What you are is a ninja and one of the few thin girls in Konoha," Shikamaru pointed out. With an apathetic eye, he gazed at her pale stomach, a low gurgle emitting from her washboard abs filling the room, "Why bother with all this?"

Ino's face burned red and she began to puff herself up, getting ready to unleash a full tirade upon the lazy shinobi.

"What I meant was," Shikamaru hastily added, "Why not just get Sakura and Tenten to eat more?"

"Hmm..." she mused and Shikamaru sighed in relief.

"She is such a bothersome woman. Maybe I should just keep my mouth shut until she's done scheming." he thought.

"Hey, Choji," Ino finally called. Her rotund teammate's head popped up from his hiding spot under the table, "I don't have the time to work on them both. Which one would you suggest?"

Not eager to piss her off again, Choji sincerely contemplated the question.

"Well..."
112221221221.title: The next morning, we find Ino trying to practic...

choices: To the arena, where the contest begins immediately!
They get there with some time to spare... check out the competition?
112221221222.content:
Her eyes shoot open at the sound of the alarm by her bed, prompting an upset moan from the sleepy mound of flesh that was Sakura Haruno. The incessant mechanical buzzing of her bedside antagonist had roused the sleeping giant from a night deprived of sleep and much angst. Slowly she unblanketed her expanse and threw the covers off of her, remarking how much harder it seemed to make the initial first swing across her own girth. Her clumsiness only enhanced by the girth surely acquired by last night's big pre-celebration binge, she fumbled around uselessly for the stop button on her alarm. With a thick pointer finger, Sakura suffocated the button underneath her thick finger flab until she felt a click and reeled in her doughy appendage. After safely returning her arm to her side, Sakura's sleepy eyes traveled downwards to the flower-patterned mountain that rose from her bed, a mountain that had grown distinctly larger since training for this contest.

Large and squishy, her prideful gut stood tall even when Sakura lay down. Even now, after a long night of digestion and churning, it gurgled and ached for more and more sustenance to feed its gluttonous demands- having been spoiled quite a bit this past month and developing quite a bad attitude when deprived. Sakura's hands traveled upwards to touch her stomach, applying pressure on its soft exterior to feel just how deep her hands sunk into the quivering midsection. She winced, the demanding gurgles from her stomach combined with even the lightest touch did little but upset her. It rested atop her thighs, even now in a reclined position, which had grown equally thick and overheated as their inconsiderate neighbor crossed their property line. They touched constantly, the friction caused by their constant domestic squabbles and the effort of lugging all of the equally expansive junk in Sakura's trunk leading to some very uncomfortable chafing every time Sakura so much as made an effort to keep up with her lighter, more mobile friends.

Her breasts lay flopped to either side of her, not sagging so much as renovated for better release of air. When standing and in a bra that actually fit, Sakura's turkey neck not only touched, but rubbed against her ample cleavage now; so while she slept, bra-less, her breasts simply moved to allow more adequate breathing. It wasn't comfortable, especially when factoring in the fact that her bulging upper-arms also required substantial amount of space on her bed, but it seemed to get the job done. Or at least it had for the past few weeks. There was another violent rumbling coming from the primadona paunch Sakura sported, growing angry that she had not been fed yet. With a sleepy sigh she began the tedious and overwhelming process of lifting herself from bed. After which, she stood red faced and out of breath in rather illfitting pajamas.

Needless to say, they weren't ill fitting more than a month ago. Tight, granted, but she could at least force the bottom to her lowermost roll. At this point, an even month later, the poor flowery pj's could barely wrap around her spare tire!

She looked at herself in the mirror, distraught at the sight of an even fatter Sakura Haruno staring back at her. "Oh man, this isn't good!" she said as she grabbed two handfuls of her gut and shook it violently. Every inch of her bounced and did the vertical can-can with her stomach, right up to even her facial flab. Turning sideways, she struggled to catch a glimpse of her violently expanded derriere. Even that proved to be a challenge as with the ever growing lack of neck present and at her disposal, Sakura was losing more and more mobility as she became rounder and rounder. "I am gonna kill Ino for this!" Sakura said with her usual fiery attitude as she waddled over to her closet in hopes of finding something -anything, really- that would fit her.

She settled on something simple, a red top with her clan's white oval on the tummy (however it looked more like an oval at this point) and some shorts that she had borrowed from Tenten. Sure she looked like a total whale in these clothes as her fat tried desperately to escape, but there really wasn't much of an option for her at this point...

Suddenly, there was a knock on her bedroom door. "Who is it?" she bellowed

"It's Ino!" a muffled, though familiar, voice resounded, "You up yet?!"

Great, just the person she didn't want to see. "Yeah, come on in, I'm just getting dressed!"

The door opened with a slight creaking sound before shutting, light footsteps trailing into the room as Ino made herself at home. "Don't bother, I already got your uniform for you." the blond said confidently as she threw a heavy set of folded garments Sakura's way. "Hey!" Sakura said in slight annoyance, "I'm already dressed, Ino-Pig!" Ino put her hands on her hips, pivoting out her hip defiantly, "I just figured you wouldn't want to get all that food on your clothes since you'll have to give them back to Tenten once I whip you back into shape after this contest." she said flatly, "Well, whatever shape you had before." The pinkheaded porker rolled her vibrant green eyes and resigned to changing, "Okay, fine, I'll change." she said in a resigned tone, "So you're serious about helping me diet and exercise, right?" she said as she struggled to pull off her top, "You're not just saying that so I'll keep going along with your stupid plan?"

"Oh, yeah, sure." Ino said unconvincingly as she sat down on Sakura's bed, quietly noting how little give there was left in her mattress. But of course, Ino didn't really have the time or motivation to train a lazy cow like Sakura. Childhood friends or not, Ino just knew that some people were born to be fat. Sure, in some parallel universe she was probably an awesome ninja who went on missions and got to be on a team and, knowing how smart she was, was probably the best in her class. But no, this Sakura was just lazy. No skin off of Ino's nose, she was still a great friend... so long as boys weren't involved or she wasn't calling her that dreaded "pig" name of hers.

"What about Tenten?"

"What about her?"

"Are you going to train her too?"

"That girl's a lost cause." Ino said enthusiastically, "Now come on, we've got to get to Hokage's Palace before she eats the whole arena."

Sakura emerged from her closet dressed even more plainly than she was when she entered. In a white t-shirt donning the village's symbol in black, her dangerous curves were accentuated. Even going so far as to stretch the Hidden Leaf Symbol across her tummy wasn't enough to disguise the fact that she looked like a giant white blob. And her red sweats, also embroidered with white hemming and an epically proportioned village symbol on the buttocks, did little to conceal her cankles, nor her thighs or chubby calves. Her ass looked huge, which it was, and even as uncomfortable as they were- Sakura still jiggled!

"Ino, do I really have to-" Sakura was cut off abruptly when Ino grabbed her chubby wrist and yanked her out the door, superior ninja training reigning superior over the lazy ways of pretty much Sakura's entire life.

"Yeah, come on!"

"But I haven't even eaten breakfast yet!"

"No time, more room for you to fill!"
112221221222.title: Cashing in the Prized Porker

choices: But we can do it! (confidence spurs them on and Sakura eats at full power)
I'm not so sure I can do this... (Ino has to spur them on...And maybe help)
1122212212221.content:
Shortly afterwards the heavyset pink haired girl and her kunoichi friend were at the arena where the Chunin exams took place, Sakura recalled it because she had gone there years ago to support Ino while she competed against Kin of the Sound Village.

The audience was packed with spectators, ready to see the various contestants engorge themselves until only one remained. Every year had a kind of theme and the theme this year was a picnic, hence the outdoors area. There was a massive plaid blanket on the ground and several industrial strength reinforced chairs on one long table that stetched from one wall to the next. There would be roughly twenty participants and the quantity of tucker was going to be massive, just like Sakura herself. As the porcine duo entered the field the immediately came upon Tenten, eating a bowl of ramen in a way that would put Naruto himself to shame.

"Washus guysh?" the plump brunette asked asshe slurped down her meal nonchalantly, she was dressed similarly to Sakura, her massive figure being shamelessly emphasized by her ensemble. Her gigantic ass, bigger than Sakuras, was put on full display, each cheek large and firm. While her belly had slightly more coverage than Sakura's, yet still her shirt clung to it, highlighting her flabbiness in pink fabric.

"Not much, did you get here early?" Sakura asked back. Ino would've chided Tenten for eating, but she knew better than to insult a..plus sized person while they ate.

"Yup!" she announced as she finished off the last of her meal. "We've got some stiff competition too. Kurenai, Shizune, Anko, Ms. Yugao, and alot of other big eaters are here, not to mention the Hokage. Rumor has it that we'll even have foreign contestants this year."

"Really? This year sounds like a bit of a challenge..."
1122212212221.title: And so it begins.

choices: The opening ceremony begins, and the matchups are announced! It's Sakura vs....
There's a slight delay as they have to wheel in one of the larger competitors...
11222122122212.content:
"I-I'm not so sure I can do this..."

With her head hung low, Sakura's voice was muffled somewhat by her own considerable bulk as she voiced a nagging discomfort that had been eating away at the back of her mind while she ate away at everything else this past month. Surely they had the skills, both Tenten and Sakura's gelatinous forms could attest to that alone. And again, they were plenty practiced in the art of eating and gluttony, being keen on being able to fit as much as possible into their tummies and developing their own unique styles of consumption (jokingly named eatjutsu between the three of them). But the obvious remained just that to Sakura: Tenten was a renowned eater throughout the village, and as was she... but these women had grown exponentially, only since the new Hokage had been indited- about three or four years ago- was when most of these women started expanding. Their stomachs must have been composed of rubber to put on such an astonishing amount of weight so quickly!

Tenten, busy munching away at her bowl of noodles until now, actually put down her chopsticks for a moment to contemplate what her rationalistic team mate had just put forth. It seemed to resonate with her the fact that while she, again quite the seasoned eater, would hold up well in a contest of amateurs; this contest was between professional gourmands from all across the Ninja World! There was a good chance of a girl like her not winning, or even placing at all! Slowly and sadly, Tenten's utensiled hands fell to her dough sidemost collection of fat as Sakura's words of reason reached her...

"Silly fat girl!" Ino said confidently as she touched Sakura on the padded shoulder, "Of course you can, you two are the biggest eaters I've ever met- I work with Choji, I would know- if anyone's gonna win us that million Ryo, I know it'll be one of you two." she moved her hands down to Sakura's many bulges and tummy rolls and gave them a quick slap, "This tummy's made of iron, you can handle anything these hogs can throw at you, and I'll be right beside you to cheer you on!"

Strangely enough, at the conclusion of Ino's pep talk, Sakura actually felt better than when she did before Ino started talking! She raised her head to look her longtime friend in the eyes- green meeting sparkling blue- before a smile creased her chubby chipmunk cheeks. "You're right, I can so do this!" Sakura said passionately, her confidence returned to her. Tenten looked up too, finishing up her noodles with gusto, "Yeah, that's right, let's show these tourists how we chow down in Konoha!"

"YEAH!!"

At this, all three started towards the competor's arena, only diverting when the two of the supposed three eaters of Team Ino started heading towards the stands, rather than the eating stage...

"Ino!!" Sakura hollered, "You said you'd be right beside me!!"

"In spirit." Ino said haughtily, "After all, can't waste my perfect figure. That's a job for girls who don't have figures to lose!"
11222122122212.title: Silly Fat Girl...

choices: Kurenai
An unknown person
112221221222121.content:
After a few minutes the competition had begun. Sakura, Tenten, and several other competitors were seated in the chairs while the Emcee stood in the center of the field. Behind him was a monitor which had his image broadcast so that those far away could see him.

"Ladies, gentlemen, good folks of Konoha and beyond! Welcome to the 27th annual Konoha Stuff-a-thon. Today, all of these brave eaters before me will compete to see who can eat the most."

At his pause the audience gave a loud roar. Sakura clapped her meaty hands together as well, while in the stands Ino held her hands over her ears, anting the noise to end.

"We have with us today our champion and Hokage, Tsunade "Debukage" Senjuu!"

Another round of applause went off as the mountain of lard known as Tsunade raised a blubbery arm to wave to the crowd while she stood. In excess of 800lbs, she was more than likely the biggest and most powerful of the villagers. She sat in her own specially made chair that Shizune carried for her most of the time, but thanks to her inhuman strength she was able to stay mobile. Her most prominent feature aside from her girth and might was her impossibly large breasts, an object of much of Jiraiya's research.

"With an incredible eating habit and nearly insatiable appetite she has been unmatched since her debut, this year we may have an upset but that remains to be seen. Now then, we will begin with a randomized pairing.

Ino's face turned even whiter at the words coming from Sakura's mouth.

"No...I'm not...I'm not going to become like you two!"

"Then we're not entering. Guess you'll have to wave goodbye to all that money," Tenten murmured, knowing Ino wouldn't be able to just leave things at that.

Sakura and Tenten shared a look before giggling at Ino.

112221222.title: But so are you!

112222.content:
Sakura quickly arrived at the BBQ restaurant despite her overly-corpulent form with an annoyed Ino lagging behind. Waiting for her friend at the door, Sakura panted from the physically intensive 'jog' that she had just performed, her generous chest rising with each breath, and due to the savory smell wafting out from the restaurant, Sakura began to drool slightly as well. A few moments later and Ino caught up, perfectly fine due to the lack of flab on her petite figure. Seeing Sakura in such a state, she knocked her out of it with a hearty pat on the back, sending ripples through her figure and causing her gut to jiggle randomly.

"Ow! Wait was that for?" yelled the puffed up pinkette, turning to face her smirking friend.

"Hey, you were the one who was in a trance because you can't control that gut of yours." said Ino, pointing towards Sakura's pale gut sticking out through her too small red top. With a blush matching the color tone of her pink covered head, Sakura let out a huff and barged into the restaurant, eager to chow down on Ino's behalf, and Sakura resolved to go all out to get back at her teasing friend. Having been greeted by the plump waitress, the pair were quickly seated and Sakura eagerly began to browse the menu, finding each entree equally delicious.

"I know I did say that this was my treat, but I think you might want to cut back a bit." said Ino as she also looked through the menu for her favorites.

"What's that supposed to mean?" said the other girl in a familiar grouchy tone. With a sigh, Ino pointed out all of the obese customers happily chowing down in the eatery and how many of them appeared to be squished into their booths.

"I mean, you're not that big but you're getting there. Do you really want to end up like those chumps?" Looking down towards her belly, she did noticed that it was pressing slightly against the table and that just a bit of flesh was flowing over the surface. One part of her felt that she really should diet down, she never did choose to be overweight, her mother's cooking simply gave her bad eating habits and she always felt that she never had a 'chance' to be thin in adulthood. However, another part of her grew quite excited at the site, for the sheer fact that she was so big already and had the 'chance' to get even bigger. Sakura remained in thought, causing her friend to remain quiet as well. She was simply teasing the poor girl, but perhaps her words were put to good use. And if Sakura was going to cut back, she could always indulge a bit more to tease her even further!
112222.title: The Choice

choices: Ino brings her concerns to Tsunade. Tsunade soothes her worries.
Sakura, now set on growing bigger, keeps on relying on Ino for food.
1122221.content:
"Chumps is pretty harsh, don't you think Ino? Besides, you paying for my meal means you like hanging out with a "chump" like me, right?"

"Yeah, and I don't think everyone's a chump it's just...it can't be healthy to live like that. I mean I know our Hokage and Shizune are huge, much like every other woman here except me, and they haven't had any major issues. But it just feels like something bad will happen and our ninja won't be at full force owing to our heavy populace."

"I'd say you've been hanging out with Shikamaru too much," Sakura replied, scarfing down another bowl of ramen and signalling the waitress for a few more plates of ribs while doing so.

"You're probably right," Ino replied, observing her closest friend in her element. Sakura looked so happy, so vibrant, like this. She had worried, after diving into her ninja studies, that Sakura would end up falling prey to some of the meaner bullies in town. Then, after she'd become a fully fledged ninja and Ino had reconnected, she saw that Sakura had only just become that much more alive.

She was very happy like this, so Ino decided to keep her happy.

Still, she couldn't help but mention Sakura's health. She was happy that she was happy, but she wouldn't her healthy too.

Sakura leaned back, belched loudly, and started on the ribs which had just arrived, Ino lightly shaking her head at her pal's appetite.
1122221.title: Sakura gives in and orders as much as she can eat

choices: Ino chats up with Naruto, to get on his good graces
Ino ignores the blonde, time to talk with Tsunade
11222211.content:
After watching her pink haired friend put a rather large dent in her wallet, the two parted ways. Sakura was headed back home, while Ino thought it would be a wise idea to seek advice from her Hokage, the immense Tsunade. Ino had been quite familiar with her leader, as she was a ranking shinobi and often came to her when she was lost in thought or confused about certain missions. While the Hokage was quite obese for a woman of her age, there was no hesitation in Ino's eyes that she could instantly defeat nearly everyone in the village, save for the Namikaze family, but they are the one exception to that. Reaching the Hokage's tower, the blonde haired ninja greeted the jolly guards as she made her way up, ignoring the continent elevator that the heavier crowd always used. Approaching the large wooden doors of Tsunade's office, Ino walked up to Shizune's desk and began to chat with the plump older woman. While Tsunade's partner was to be considered fat, with thick thunder thighs and a modest pot belly, she was nowhere near the weight of Tsunade. Eagerly munching on a simple bag of chips, the black haired woman oddly seemed determined. Looking towards the trash can, Ino saw that there were plenty of wrappers flowing out but she pushed that out of her current thoughts.

"Hi there Shizune. I'm here to talk with Tsunade-sama. I know its really short notice, but I just need some advice about a certain friend." said Ino honestly. Pulling away from her sodium filled snack, Shizune gave her a warm smile.

"Oh hello there Ino, didn't notice you there. Its been a slow day today for all of us at the office, so there shouldn't be an issue. Tsunade is just speaking with someone right now, so she should be finished up soon. Here, sit down while you wait." answered the plump woman as she pointed towards a spare chair right next to her. Giving a nod, Ino sat down, laying back in a lazy fashion. Shizune began to offer her some chips, but Ino declined, having already eaten her fair share of calories for the day. The pair spent the next ten minutes chatting up about recent developments in the village, how 'so and so' hooked up or which restaurants made the top rankings for the month. Soon, a figure exited the room and Ino got a good glace at them. He looked to be a young man with blonde hair in a similar shade of hers and piercing blue eyes. The young man also had three whiskered marks trailing from his cheeks and some rather large canines in his mouth as he was sporting a large, happy grin. As he walked away, Ino was a bit surprised to see who it was.

"Isn't that Naruto Namikaze?" asked the blonde, shocked to see him up close for the first time. Normally, this Naruto would be incredibly busy, given his reputation and his family background as well. As a shinobi, people constantly requested him for services and many also pay top dollar. Rumors have it that his services actually generate enough funds to dwarf Tsunade's debts. Ino could only shudder at the thought of owing that much money.

"Yup, he had some business with Tsunade, but now you should be able to see her if you'd like." said the black haired woman, munching on her snacks once more.

"Well..."
11222211.title: Crafty Choice

choices: Tsunade shows Ino that the fat women of Kohona are healthy.
Tsunade shows Ino that getting fat raises chakra levels in women.
112222112.content:
Shaking her head of the sight of this rising star of the ninja world, Ino made her way into the offices of her boss, Tsunade lounging back far more lazily than Ino herself had earlier. Her robe wasn't tied in the slightest, allowing her gut to hang free and droop heavily downwards.

Ino, having much experience with avoiding Tsunade's more shameless displays, kept her eyes locked with her superior.

"Tsunade-sama," Ino began, but a rousing belch cut her off as Tsunade sat up more fully, her gut seeming to just surge forward that much more.

"For the last time, Ino, just Tsunade. You're going to be my student soon, correct? Leave the titles for the diplomats."

"Alright, Tsunade. I...I didn't expect to actually become your student for a few more years."

"You've got talent, you care about your comrades, and you haven't failed a mission yet. I'd say that more than qualifies you over your peers. Is that what you wanted to speak with me about?"

"No, Tsunade, actually it's my friend Sakura. I'm worried about her. She's getting so large and she's really enjoying it. I'm just concerned that her health will worsen."

Tsunade smiled warmly at Ino then, getting to her feet and waddling up to her soon-to-be student.

"Let me show you something, Ino."

Turning around, Tsunade walked towards a door Ino had never been through in the Hokage's office, her superior's mighty rear jiggling and quivering as if beckoning Ino to follow.

"Well don't just stand there, Ino, c'mon!"

"Yes ma'am!" Ino replied, following after her massive boss and soon-to-be teacher.
112222112.title: Ino ignores the blonde, time to talk with Tsunade

choices: It was Hinata, the newest Anbu recruit
Free choice
1122221121.content:
Ino hesitantly followed the overfed Tsunade into the mysterious room. A part of her was telling her that this was a trap, that she had stumbled into some sort of weird conspiracy and that she was going to be 'silenced.' Shaking off such strange ideas, Ino suddenly stumbled into Tsunade's large rear, quickly placing her hands on the older woman's back-fat to stabilize herself. Getting a hold of her surroundings, Ino noticed that they entered the room, but were still in a dimly lit hallway and that Tsunade had stopped in order to unlock the door farther inside.

"Woah now, isn't this a bit too early for groping? I mean we only just entered the hallway and all." teased Tsunade as her fat fingers fiddled with the keys. Ino's face reddened with embarassment as she bowed for such a 'disrespectful' action. Finally opening the door, Tsunade let out a loud laugh as she raised Ino from her position and gently patted her head.

"Now now, I'll have none of that ultra polite crap from you when it's only the two of us. Anyways, the door is open so try to pay attention this time, or feel up my bum again, your choice." with a chuckle, the Hokage walked into the room, Ino following right behind her behind once more. Turning on the lights to the hidden room, Tsunade sat her hefty body near the desk as she began to fiddle with a few documents. Taking a look around, Ino saw that the room was rather dust and the air was quite stifling. The blonde could only assume that this was a secret room where the overweight leader kept her classified documents. Taking a seat at the front of the desk, Ino remained quiet as Tsunade began to search through her drawers.

"Ah here it is." said the older woman as she pulled a manila envelope and took out a few documents. Reading it through, she had a satisfied look on her face. She then tossed the documents over to Ino who began to scan over them as well.

"As you can see, Sakura is quite healthy, her chakra levels are quite plentiful and she has no issues with diabetes, asthma and the like."

"Wow, I had no idea she was that fat, wait! This isn't the issue!"

"Oh then was was the problem then? If it doesn't involve her documents or anything like that, I'm afraid I can't help you." Letting out a sigh, Ino placed a hand to her head to gather exactly what she wanted to say.

"Look, it wasn't whether or not she had issues with her health, it was about how she was acting. Lately Sakura does nothing but stuff her face and it's not natural even if most of the women in the village are huge. It's like when she does it, she's a completely different person and that scares me a bit. She doesn't respond, her face turns into a deep scowl and I swear, even her eyes turn darker. I worry because I feel she's going to hurt herself badly one of these days." Placing her hands on the desk and resting her head, Tsunade tried to think up any reason for such a change. In all of her years of stuffing, consuming and eating, she had never heard of such a thing happening. Perhaps it was worth looking into?

"Hm, I'll see if I have any info here matching that description. For now, don't avoid Sakura or anything, just hang out with her normally and tell me if anything else happens." Nodding, Ino excused herself as she left the secret room and headed back home. Letting out another sigh, the older woman hated it when problems came about. Soon, Shizune came into the room, her wide hips brushing against the aging doorway.

"Tsunade, you have another visitor. You seem quite popular today."

"Oh lucky me."
1122221121.title: Pink Drives Monster

11222211211.content:
Hinata's mighty belly entered the room a good foot before Hinata herself did, Tsunade eying the violet-haired heir's figure as she did so.

Hinata was wearing the typical uniform of an ANBU chonin and appeared ready to defend or attack in an instant.

Still, the way she waddled towards her suggested that Hinata was still shy about something or other.

"How can I help you, Hinata?"

Hinata's fat face burned red as she stammered out her crush on the blond-haired Uzumaki boy.

Tsunade smirked at that, grateful that the issue wasn't so troublesome as Ino's problem.

"Well what do you want me to do about it, young lady? If you have a crush on Naruto, tell him."

"That's the thing. I...whenever I-I get around him I just freeze up!"

"How about I send the two of you on a mission together? A simple D rank mission that the lowest level chonin could do?"

"That...that might work."

"Mmmm...well it better because if this fails it will be your responsibility to take matters of your heart in your own hands. Buckle down and just belt out how you feel. It does no one any good if you hide your feelings from the person you care about, understood?"

"Yes, Tsunade-sama, thank you!"

Hinata soon waddled away, leaving Tsunade alone for a few moments until Shizune entered.

Watching her assistant/lover waddle close, Tsunade smirked at the way Shizune had undone her robe, letting her gut hang heavily in the apron that it was. From there, Tsunade saw just a bit of Shizune's rear end as she waddled to and fro, the flash of more rear devouring more of the back of Shizune's XXXL sized robes making Tsunade lick her lips.

"I take it we have no more appointments for the day, my dear Shizune?"

"None, Tsunade-sama, though there is considerable paperwork still left to do."

Tsunade grunted at that, bringing her tubby soulmate close, kissing her fiercely. Once they parted, Shizune dazed, Tsunade less so, Tsunade spoke.

"First let's stuff ourselves silly, then we can do paperwork, okay?"

"Paperwork first, dear."

"Food first!" Tsunade replied.

"I'll feed you for every bit of paperwork you get done, okay?"

"Alright, and I'll feed you twice as much as you feed me once we're done with one stack, okay?"

"Agreed, now let's go to our work."

"And our food."

"And our food," Shizune repeated, smiling warmly as she broke apart a bit on Tsunade's left, one each of their fat hands and chubby digits holding onto one another as they exited the privacy of the Hokage's document office and towards the more open, and food-filled, mansion proper.
11222211211.title: It was Hinata, the newest Anbu recruit

choices: The next day, Ino spends some time with Sakura, talks of diet abound
Hinata's progress report
112222112112.content:
The energetic blonde waited at the village gates, relieved to have such an easy mission for the day. He was still feeling aches from the past five missions he had undergone the day before and wanted nothing more to finish up quickly and head back to his apartment for rest and relaxation. His thoughts began to wander and eventually reached to that of his partner for the mission.

'Hinata Hyuuga.' thought the blonde as he pictured the blubbery girl's face in his mind. Now it wasn't hard to figure out that the long haired young woman had a bit of a crush on him, he was used to such affections due to how popular he was in the village. Hinata however, was a different case as he didn't think he could actually go out with her. It wasn't because the blonde was celibate or shy or any such nonsense. He'd gone out before, had a few successful relationships that all ended amicably and knew the ins and outs of being with someone else in a romantic fashion. He had a great teacher after all, though because of said teacher, Naruto was infamous in the village for feeding, fattening and leaving girls. Of course all of those rumors were unfounded, but they still hurt! Giving out a sigh, the reason that Naruto concluded why he could never go out with Hinata was that the girl was so 'pure.' She was like an angel that deserved to be with someone as 'angelic' with her. His own 'devilish' traits could never mesh well with hers and he would always be afraid of hurting her or even breaking her heart. Though her body was certainly 'devilish' in many ways, especially her rotund gut and those thick thunder-thighs. Shoving such thoughts out of his mind, he reminded himself of his resolve and vowed to never get involved with the innocent.

'I should get some ramen after this, let off some steam. Maybe 'accidentally' run into a flabby girl or two.' Of course, he would be the first to admit his own 'devilishness.' Stuck in his thoughts of ramen and soft bodies, he failed to notice the heavyset Hyuuga walk towards him and then try to gain his attention.

"Naruto?" she asked with confusion, tilting her fat face to the side in curiosity. It wasn't like the blonde to daydream, he always planted his feet into the 'present.'

"Oh Hinata, didn't see you there. Ready to head out?" A smile on her face, she nodded as she began her way outside the village. Naruto right behind her, he let out a pervy smile as he watched her huge Hyuuga rear bounce side to side.

'Maybe I can have a few accidents with Hinata too.'
112222112112.title: Blue Eyed Clear Eyed

choices: Hinata confesses to Naruto, Ino and Sakura meet Tsunade.
