Her round, doubly chinned face flushed a full red as her robe clung to her sweaty arms. As she climbed upwards, however, one couldn't miss the massively flaring backside that she sported. Only a foot or so short of being as wide in the backside as she was tall standing up, the booty-licious Shizune would be the first to clear the massive set of steps. Her breasts, quite generous in her more than slight obesity, were still not much to speak of when compared to the reverberating balls of flesh that weighed her down from behind. Her demeanor was the least affected by this new change in appetites, leading her to be the serious one out of the two of them- most concerned with diplomatic responsibility and keeping a reign on her now freely indulgent Hokage.

"Lady Tsunade!" she chided from the top stair, bringing a hand to her swollen busom, "You've got to hurry; the Raikage's acceptance letter said that he agreed to see us from 2 to 4, we've got to make it on time or he might not listen!"

Far down below, almost two entire staircases. a loud grunt can be heard: "Shaddap Shizune!"

Grown gruff and grumpy without her daily meals, Tsunade was going through withdrawls. Bitter and angry with everything, she was finding it hard not to snap Shizune's neck. She might have too, if she just weren't too damn fast for her. Yes, I'm leading to the fact that the near 350 pound Shizune was a challenge for a once proud, mighty kunoichi become Hokage. That was the point.

Resembling more of a living ball of bloated flesh than an esteemed ninja at this point, Tsunade's flight up the stairs was all but impossible to finish. With a massive, sagging belly that hung well to her knees, a full arm's length out in front of her, maneuvering up stairs was enough of a challenge. Her breasts too, grown twice the size of her own head, provided much strain to her back- much to her chagrin when she actually had to stand. What's worse, her overall girth and rotunditude didn't sit well with the narrower parts that led to the Raikage's office, her squishy flab getting wedged more than once as she was overall just as wide as Shizune's bum. On top of being ludicrously out of shape, this was no picnic for Tsunade. She would have loved a picnic at this point... oh her kingdom for a picnic.

"-Huhh- I'm coming!" she spat back huskily after a deep inhale. In awkwardly deep grunts and waddling maneuvers Tsunade would finally make it to the bottom of the final flight of stairs, "Ugh this is... so... hard!" she moaned, her can-do attitude long spoiled through immediate gratification courtesy of Y-Mei, "Why couldn't he have.... just... ugh!... met us at... my place?!"

Shizune, doubled over past her belly in an attempt at catching her breath and exposing the shape of that massive ass of hers, chided her leader lightly, "The letter said that... he'd only be accepting visitors from us... I didn't think that we should... that we should push it by asking him to come out to see us!"

"Why... why wasn't I-uh.... why wasn't I informed of this letter?!" Tsunade's deeper voice bellowed from the bottom of the stairs, "I'm the Hokage, I should really get these.... these things!"

"You were busy with a serving of fried chicken at that moment, I felt it wise not to bother you..."

"A-And.... and... ugh, these steps!" Tsunade whined as she lifted one heavy leg up to the next level, "And what is that.... supposed to mean you oversized heifer?!"

"Lady Tsunade!"

"You heard me, as soon as we get back, I'm putting you... I'm putting you on a strict diet..." she said coldly, "Now move, your bubble butt is blocking... is blocking the hallway."
13131211121.title: Don't you just hate Character Limits?

choices: I beat A in a fight for the title...No really I did!
I tricked him into retiring and naming me as his heir, it was pretty easy.
131312111212.content:
After a few more moments of the monumental women trying their best to squeeze through every doorway and break every threshold that kept their cellulite laden bodies from entering the main office room. After all that stair climbing and managing to move their more than plus sized bodies into the main office room they noticed that the meeting room was actually the dining hall.

Upon seeing a pile of food that looked as tall as the crazy ass tower Tsunade managed to run forward, enticed by the scent off food and began shoveling anything edible into her maw, chewing noisily. Shizune was only a bit more reserved and only grabbed one slice of cake (or rather her definition which was little more than half of the cake) and nibbled on it as she took a seat that surprisingly didn't break under her titanic tush.

"Shouldn't we wait for the Raikage before we start eating his food?" she managed to ask between chomps, to which Tsunade gave her one of the worst possible glares.

"Be quiet Shizune, it's his fault for not being present for his own meeting. Besides that I'm hungry. If he wants to gripe he can do it to my face."

"Actually I think I will gripe." said a somewhat familiar female voice. A few moments later the duo felt tremors run through their fattened folds as the stranger waddled over, each step threatening the integrity of the building. A second later none other than Ino Yamanaka, or some incredibly obese woman who dwarfed even Tsunade's rotund frame. She was probably somewhere above a half ton weight wise and by comparison made Shizune look anorexic. She tried her best to wear a smug expression, but food crumbs were around her massive cheeks and her extra chins. The Kage's robe was open though, to reveal her bear gut that was probably as big as a grown man, even open the garment threatened to rip open. Without looking at her barely covered backside one couldn't tell if Ino was wearing underwear, and her top barely covered her enormous tits that threatened to pop out at any moment. All the while she muttered under her breath about needing some more grub.

"Ino?!" Tsunade and Shizune gasped.

"Yep, but you can call me Lady Raikage." Ino smirked. The other blonde woman couldn't believe that her former subordinate was now on equal terms with her ranking wise, but the question was how? She wasn't even a villager from the Cloud village.

"How the hell did that happen?" Tsunade gasped, still chowing down despite her disbelief.

The two visiting women stood baffled at how nonchalant their hostess was towards this rather unbelievable statement.

"Y-You... tricked him?" Shizune repeated, a snowball of cake falling from the clump in her hands, "The Raikage A, you tricked him into retiring?"

Ino abruptly lowered her entire body to the head of the table, causing the entire floor below them to shiver with tremors. Breathing heavily, the mountainous blonde bit into whatever several items of food could fit between her fat fingers before repositioning her cumbersome legs. "Yup..." she puffed curtly before taking another large chomp out of what now resembled a hand-fruit made of candy and fried dough, "I told you... I told you that already." she wheezed stupidly, "Why bring it up again? Just accept it... I hate to repeat myself... Lady Shizune."

The girl before them barely resembled a ninja, let alone a trusted Raikage. To a spectator's point of view, it was understandably how such a rotund little wiseass like Ino Yamanaka had managed to outfox the Big Black and Bowerful Raikage. But then again, Tsunade's own thousand yard stares lately weren't that encouraging either.

From the end of the table, what Shizune could see past the food towering above the table, Ino had grown into a monstrous ball of living obesity. Sitting down, she was six feet across from roll to roll, and she had to sit two feet from the table; her belly still cutting into the edge. Plump hands, any trace of nerve or bone within them having been devoured like so many cakes they had led to the slaughter, sporadically went from struggling past their own top heavy upperarms in hopes of feeding Ino's gluttonous requirements to habitually lazing on one of her rolls. Her blue eyes, once big and exciting, had grown glazed and squinted not due to age but due to her suffocating cheeks with a set and sparing pair of dimples. Ino's chins had grown so engorged that the lowermost one had completely engulfed her neck, flab resting atop flab rather comfortably as she continued to speak in short sentences and stuff her kraut.

She let out a massive belch, momentarily halting her exhibition into cuisine before beginning again anew.

There was an awkward pause between the three of them, only the sound of both blondes grunting, masticating, and swallowing breaking the silence.

"So... are you gonna tell us how?" Shizune said impatiently

It was a full minute before Ino had deemed herself full enough to continue on. Unfortunately it wasn't exactly the straightest answer. Apparently it took a lot more energy to curse out one's former superiors than explain the no-doubt extremely complicated procedure it took to impeach the leader of a ninja village. Good to know for those history reports. "God, you are so stupid!" she finally concluded, "I don't know how Lady Tsunade even puts up with you!"

This wasn't the first time they had eaten together at a restaurant nor was it the first time Sakura had seen Anko stuff herself. The pinkette really had no idea how Anko could eat so much and still remain slim. But she knew that it was only matter of time before her gluttony caught up with her.

"You know, if you don't cut back on the food you're going to get fat." Sakura said.

"Heh, I –UURRP- doubt it. I've been eating like this –UUURRRP- for a long time, Sakura. If I was gonna get fat I would've gotten fat a long –URP- time ago." Anko argued as she rubbed her big belly. "You should order more food next time. Enjoy yourself! UUUURRRP!"

"No thanks. I'm trying to stay in-shape." Sakura stated, looking at Anko's gut.

"Suit your –URP- self. I'll show you tomorrow at –UUURRRRP- training how fat I'm getting!" Anko said, a competitive grin on her face.

It didn't take Anko long to prove Sakura right. It took her less then a month, in fact.

"I uh, guess I should've listened, heh heh!" Anko let out a nervous chuckle as she observed her 215 pound body in the mirror.

Most of her weight had gone straight to her gut. Anko had a big belly that jiggled and wobbled with every step she took, big breasts that that would jiggle and bounce whenever she jumped, a big ass that completely filled up any chair she on and was just as jiggly as her gut, and a round face with with plump cheeks and a small double chin.

Anko grabbed the sides her belly and gave it a good shake, she watched as it continued to jiggle and sway even after she stopped shaking it. A large blush appeared on Anko's face. She couldn't recall the last time she ever blushed.

"Man, Sakura is never going to let me hear the end of this. I hope I can still keep up with her during training." It didn't take long for Anko's optimism to return. "What am I saying? Of course I can!"

This was to be seen as normal behavior to the common folk. but it was part of Tsunade's plan. After all, what was more dangerous then careless snacking?

"Hey Shizune, Tsunade is expecting me right?" he asked. The older girl looked up from her own paperwork and properly greeted Naruto. She had a feeling that Naruto would enjoy what Tsunade was going to assign for him.

"Yes and you can go right in. Let me be the first and say have fun!" This was said with an added giggle, an action that confused the 'fox boy.' Since when did Shizune giggle like young girl?

"Right thanks," was his response as he entered the room. Shizune went back to filling out her paperwork. While she found this boring, it was necessary for the well-being of the village. Digging back into her bag of chips, she frowned when she reached the bottom. Quite quickly she trashed it in her bin and pulled out one more from her drawer. The job as the Hokage's assistant was tiring so she needed as much energy as she needed, or that is what she 'thought.' Clearly still under the affects of Tsunade's control, the fact that she was not bothered by a small layer of fat caking to her stomach was quite the surprise for her. Continuing on with her work and snacking, she began to prepare the paperwork for the arrival of a few new eateries.

---
Naruto entered her office, the sounds of snoring could be heard. He gave a soft smile, she always seemed so cute when she fell asleep at her desk. Slowly walking over, he gently shook her shoulder. A groan escaped her lips, the drowsy feeling still encompassing her being. Looking up to what startled her sleeping form, she realized that Naruto was here, a key part of her grand plan.

"Oh Naruto, pardon me, I was up all last night with paperwork and whatnot." she said, letting out a big yawn.

"No it's fine. So Grandma, what's going on? Do you have a mission for me, or is there some Intel?" Tsunade had noticed that Naruto seemed a bit less eager then usual. Perhaps he had been affected as well? From what she remembered, Naruto, as a male, had a fit figure; it was partially thanks to his rigorous training regiment and his special 'tenant.' Her 'Naruto' also has managed to form a relationship with her 'Sakura.' The pink haired medic in this new world seemed to forget all about the time she had spent with the blond shinobi which disheartened the leader immensely. First messing with their figures and now erasing private relationships? If Tsunade ever found the person or group to do this, she would have some 'fun' teaching them about anatomy. For now she needed to get both Naruto and Sakura, her most loyal shinobi to back her up on her plan. Unfortunately for her, the Kyuubi would prevent her from any attempt of controlling the teen in the same way that Shizune was controlled.

"Naruto, there's something I must address with you. Lately Sakura, my darling medic, has been stressed out lately. I keep telling her to ease up on the shifts at the hospital, but she won't listen to me."

"Well Sakura is always a hard worker, but I doubt she would take on more than she can handle." his thoughts flew to his pink haired teammate, the one who he had been enamored with for quite some time. Though as of late, she did seem to be somewhat distant.

"There is most likely a reason for this, but I'm just worried. I do consider you and Sakura to be my family after all." Her touching words never failed to pull Naruto at his heartstrings.

"So what do you want me to do? If Sakura doesn't listen to you, then I doubt I'll have more luck with that." Out of all the Rookie 10, Sakura was the most adverse towards listening to what he had to say. Granted he is an air-head a majority of the time, but he could prove himself to be cunning every once in a while.

"Simple. I want you to take her out, you know, show her out to town ,turn up that Uzumaki charm. I want you to show her a good time."

"Eh?"

153211111.content:
"Just take her out for a hearty dinner and make sure she has her fill. Can you do that for me Naruto?"

Naruto nodded, his blue eyes gleaming as he dashed out of the room.

The obese Tsunade chuckled, munching on a large pork bun from an earlier binge.

She'd have to send a large bag of these to her darling Shizune, who, although softening up nicely, was still far too thin for Tsunade's liking.

But first she had to deal with Sakura.

A summons was sent and not half an hour later Sakura was standing before her, Tsunade's heart going out to the woefully thin and tired-looking pinkette.

"What can I do for you, Tsunade-sama?"

"You are going out to dinner tonight with Naruto. You are going to relax and enjoy yourself. Don't worry about any weight you'll gain, because you're going to find that pigging out is something you love. No more late night shifts, no more running yourself ragged. Enjoy tonight, enjoy the moment, but most of all enjoy the food!"

Tsunade's instructions were laced with her powerful chakra, the genjutsu obviously having an effect on Sakura as the young woman patted her stomach.

"Do you have any food, Tsunade-sama?"

"Of course, Sakura, have a pork bun, they're delicious."

"Was there something you wanted from me, Tsunade-sama?"

"No, dear, just enjoy your dinner tonight."

Sakura nodded and soon left, the pork bun completely gone before she had even left the Hokage's doorway.

1532111111.content:
"Naruto, thanks for taking me out tonight. I really needed a break from work." said Sakura with a hint of red on her face, a shade a tad bit higher from her normal cotton candy colored hair. After receiving the suggestion from his Hokage, Naruto nervously went over to Sakura's apartment, flowers in hand and asked the fatigued girl if she had wanted to accompany him for dinner. Thinking it over, the girl decided after some subliminal suggestions courtesy of Tsunade. They found themselves at a nice barbeque restaurant, not too pricy and not to casual, both of them had been there a few times but never together. Seated at a booth, the small talk was abundant and the two waited for their meat to cook on the little grill implanted into their table.

"Don't worry about it Sakura. I just noticed how hard you were working at the hospital and figured you needed a little break y'know. So tonight its all about you, feel free to ask for whatever; I have it covered. exclaimed the blonde with a wide smile plastered on that whiskered face of his. To be honest he was less concerned with his standing with Sakura and more on her well-being. Sakura returned the gesture with a bashful smile but it dimmed when she realized that he had dropped the endearing honorific he had used since they were young. "If you insist, howabout getting some pork and some bowls of miso soup?"
---
Around an hour later their meal was finished, both of them were rather satisfied and Sakura herself was rather stuffed. She had long since moved from sitting across the booth to sitting next to her date. Placing her head on his shoulder, her eyes were closed as she felt rather sleepy after her large meal but for some reasons, she still felt like she could go for a bit more food. Naruto was rather content that the girl was this close to him, but he was happier that she was relaxed. His arm had reach around and wrapped around her midsection, gently rubbing her soft middle.

"Naruto why don't we go somewhere for a little desert?" Something told Naruto he needed to say yes.
1532111111.title: Upping the want

15321111111.content:
Naruto nodded and Sakura beamed, getting to her feet and dragging him up with her, nearly dashing towards the nearest ice cream vendor.

Naruto could only gulp as he watched her taut middle quiver as she moved with purpose.

He was so grateful for the Hokage's suggestion.

///

Sakura tapped her finger against her chin, hemming and hawing before finally looking at the vendor. "I'll have one of everything in your largest container please."

The vendor nodded, her demeanor not at all changed except for a slight glance towards Naruto and the blond could have sworn he saw her eyes change to Kohona's currency symbols.

Naruto gulped again and pulled out his money.

But the complete and total joy on Sakura's face as she pigged out on the ice cream more than made up for his financial loss, Sakura giggling as she realized she had a lot of the dessert on her face.

"Help me out here, Naruto!"

Naruto nodded and brushed her face with a napkin, a bit of the ice cream getting on his finger.

Like lightning, Sakura's lips wrapped around his finger and she slurped the remains of the ice cream on that digit down in record time.

Pulling back just as quickly, Sakura blushed a bit before the pair's attention was drawn elsewhere.

PING!

Both looked down to find Sakura's creamy stomach surging outwards.

But instead of shame or a red face, Sakura simply giggled, a hand going to her stomach.

"I deserve this," she murmured.

"Yeah," Naruto replied, placing his hand on top of his date's and feeling all the empty calories she was digesting in that mass she now called a stomach, "you really do."

A nap interuppted
153211111111.content:
"So tell me, how did you little date go? Did that ole Uzumaki charm do any good?" asked the blonde woman, sitting in her grand office currently munching on a small turkey leg. Naruto though the snacking was somewhat weird, but he figured she simply skipped a meal or two. From her words, he began to recall his time spent with his crush in the past few days. While not spending money on food for her, they hanged out in their apartments simply talking and getting to know each other better. Since the new Tsunade arrived in their world, missions were rather rare and she proclaimed that the village deserved a little time off. In reality it wasn't just a move to get the villagers to gain some weight, rather the other Tsunade was running them a bit ragged after the war ended. This older woman gave her precious little shinobi a smile, happy to hear that the two were progressing so rapidly in their developing relationship.

"Well you know the next step right?" Naruto tilted his head to the side as in a confused manner. Naruto figured that it would be better to remain in such a state, as close friends. Truth be told they haven't done any physical 'things' yet. Hell they haven't even held hands yet! Though Naruto had a hard time resisting the urge to hug Sakura tightly, to feel her soft body under his wandering hands, to simply feel her warmth against his. While this was a rather normal wish for a teen of his age, he chalked it up as something abnormal and blamed it on the fox inside him. "Hm, I don't think that's for the best. I mean I'm comfortable with the way that me and Sakura are right now." Placing the turkey leg back on the plate, Tsunade folder her arms and sat back into her chair, thinking of the best way to solve this little situation. Her experiences with her Sakura in the other world gave her the answer. "You don't want to pursue her and yet, is that what she really wants?"

"What do you mean?" said the blonde, his heart skipping a beat or two. If Sakura herself truly felt that way, then he would have no idea of what to do next.

"Have you not seen the way she glances at you? Those small looks she gives you simply because she wants to? Or those blushes that she gets if you stare at her for too long? Face it, she wants to be with you Naruto, just as much as you do her." All of these new thoughts were plunged into his mind, confusing the poor boy. But regardless of what his mother-like figure told him, he still needed some time to think things over. He said his goodbyes and left Tsunade to her own devices. The woman let out a sigh as she canceled her genjutsu returning her to her rotund form. She wanted to convince the boy using her genjutsu but tricking someone into a relationship was wrong no matter how you put it. She just needed to see how things would play out even with her little shove in the right direction.
---
Naruto began the walk back to his apartment still deep in thought. A part of him wanted to follow what Tsunade had told him, but he didn't want to be so hasty. Things like this needed to be planned out. Letting out a sigh, he mentally shoved this thoughts out of his head and continued on his path home. Maybe a nap would do him good.
---
The pinked haired girl laid in her pinky and comfy bed, a bit drowsy from the lunch she had eaten earlier. A rather large pizza was ordered due to the new delivery systems in place in the village and Sakura managed to eat it in one sitting. She had no idea why she was hungry but Naruto didn't seem to pay any mind to it. A hand instinctively went towards her softend belly, noticing how it had change in such few days. Dresses in a long sleeved red shirt and some boy-shorts, her apparent weight gain was spread throughout her figure. A belly had grown and softened with just a small bit of overhang that made it a true gut. A rounded waist, it did well to complement her thickened thighs and widened hips. Even her face had become more rounded than usual, the ivory surface making her look much cuter than before. Overall, it looked to be a gain of about twenty pounds, modest but not satisfactory for Tsunade. Her mind began to wander to thoughts of Naruto and how he had treated her these past few days. Taking her out to eat, simply spending time with her, it was romantic in a minimalistic way. A smile grew on her face as she recalled the times Naruto had awkwardly hugged her goodbye. Raising an arm towards the ceiling, a single thought was present in her mind.

"I want to see you, Naruto."

Resting her hands on her immense gut, Tsunade knew that after focusing on the younger generation, their families needed to be targeted as well. Generally, having a mass physical inspection would take care of all of her problems, but that would not be subtle and she could not afford for her plan to become compromised in any way, She had to approach this from another way. The obese blonde would target family members of those who worked in the hospital first, considering that most of the hospital staff had gained a considerable amount of weight. 'Dropping by' at an employees house would be easy enough to explain and she could even have Shizune do visits as well. However, before that can happen, Tsunade wanted to target families of her personal pupils, which would be Sakura and Ino.

"Shizune, how are Sakura and Ino coming along?" The raven-haired woman walked up to Tsunade, her belly stuffed nearly to the brim, making the surface a tad bit hard. She handed her mentor the files from Sakura and Ino's last physical which took place around a week ago. The blonde used this as an opportunity to rub Shizune's belly as she looked over the files. "As you can see, Sakura is coming along nicely, with a gain of sixty pounds and an increase in measurements all around. However, Ino has failed to meet your expectations, she gained only fifteen pounds and that was thanks to her eating lunches with Sakura from time to time which was stated by our intel. Ino has so far dodged the pounds and keeps up an active lifestyle." Now it would make sense to go after Ino's family as they could easily influence Ino to get fatter. She would leave that task to Shizune, Tsunade had her own reasons for targeting Sakura's family first.
---
"So Naru, this coming weekend, are you free?" asked Sakura as she pressed herself into Naruto's side. She had just had dinner at Naruto's house, a rather large meal that he had cooked himself, and the pair were resting on his couch in the living room. Dressed in one of Naruto's orange undershirts and a pair of boyshorts, her gain was quite apparently. Her bulging gut spilled onto her lap and her rear was slowly expanding, causing each cheek to jiggle with minimal movement. A hint of a double chin was present, with a more rounded face as well. Her breasts had swelled out, and were now at c-cup range, something that both of them enjoyed immensely. His arm wrapped around the girl's midsection, Naruto played with her fat, jiggling it and gently patting her as well.

"Yeah I am, what's up?" Gently kissing her on the top of her head, she gave out a small giggle.

"My mom want to finally meet you! Isn't that exciting?!" exclaimed Sakura, as she hugged Naruto tightly, pressing her soft breasts against Naruto's broad chest. Naruto could not have a more deadpan expression as he subconsciously placed on hand on the small of her back and the other on her rounded rear. He had been afraid of meeting Sakura's mom after their relationship had began. He could only imagine what kind of woman she would be, taking into account Sakura's immense temper. Looking up a Naruto, her cheeks were flushed due to the hand placed on her bum and had a rather lewd expression.

"Naru, if you wanted to have fun, you could have just asked..." said Sakura as she captured Naruto's lips in a deep kiss and caused them to fall onto the floor. Any of Naruto's previous thoughts were wiped out as he focused on Sakura.

'Maybe meeting Sakura's mom won't be so bad after all.'

The brunette woman had had some misgivings lately about her daughter's weight gain but the visit from the Hokage had lessened them and even saw Nabiki adding some more food to the meal and the idea of this enormous dessert as well.

Of course, Nabiki was also snacking here and there on some of the still cooking dishes as well, a suggestion by her leader though Nabiki didn't remember this instruction, she just decided that maybe she'd help Sakura feel even better about her gain if she started packing on the pounds as well.

Both young adults nodded and soon left, Nabiki sighing as she thought of her husband and his organization skills. Hopefully the pair of Naruto and Sakura could help him out there.

What would her husband say about her body the bigger she got, Nabiki thought. But then a soothing feeling filled her and she decided he'd love her regardless. He remembered how much he'd adored her growing figure when she was pregnant with Sakura and now there would be so much more of her than her biggest when she was with child.

But that would take a lot of eating, she decided, and added a few large bags of rolls and plenty of butter and jam to go with the rest of the feast that was just about done.

The older man attempted to hurt Naruto's hand by squeezing hard, but Naruto wasn't phased by the action. After all he had been through so much worse. In fact, he reciprocated the action by giving a nice squeeze of his own. Quickly pulling his own hand back, Ein nursed it behind his back.

I really am lucky to have your daughter be with a fool like me." said Naruto as the two men began to set the place mats, utensils, glasses and other materials needed for a hearty dinner. Eying the father of his girlfriend, he could easily see the age and experience in his eyes. Having a dark pink hair color that was cut very short, he could easily see where Sakura inherited her trademarked cotton candy colored hair. Having a medium build, it seemed that old age had failed to affect him too much. From what he's heard from Sakura, Ein was a jounin level nin with a few secret techniques that Naruto hoped to learn. Sakura's mother was a novelist and had written a few popular children's books as well. Truly, Sakura had a rather unique upbringing.

"So I think we're done here Mr. Haruno." walking over to Ein, they looked over their handiwork; it wasn't perfect but it was doable. Ein walked towards the kitchen while Naruto simply sat down, waiting for everyone to return. The blonde was glad that everything was going swimmingly and that the awkward moments were kept to a minimum. What had he been so worried about?! About a minute had passed and Ein was practically thrown out of the kitchen and nearly hit the adjacent wall. Naruto nearly leaped out of his chair in shock.

After around twenty minutes of Naruto attempting to nurse Ein back into consciousness, dinner was ready and the two females of the household brought out dinner and laid out the spread on the dinning room table. Luckily Ein had recovered before his wife became annoyed of waiting for the meal. Naruto sat down next to Sakura who was rather inattentive; she was more focused on how delicious the meal looked. Nabiki had managed to cook a pot roast, garlic mashed potatoes, grilled chicken and plenty of buttered rolls and garlic bread as sides. Honestly it's like I married a child. Oh, but I still love you so much darling." cooed Nabiki, giving a gentle kiss to her husband on the cheek. Naruto found the action quite cute and Sakura was still focused on the food in front of her, waiting for the go ahead to fill up her growing gut. Daintily pouring her husband a dish of sake, motioned for everyone to eat. Just as Naruto and Ein were about to dig in, Nabiki slapped both of their hands with record speed.

By the look on Sakura's face, Naruto could tell that he would still be pretty hungry after the meal. Ein however showed interest in his wife's actions. "Right, well step on the scale if you please Mrs. Yamanaka." said Shizune, holding a clipboard filled with dated information about Luka Yamanaka, the dear mother of Ino Yamanaka and dear wife to Inoichi Yamanaka. The woman had been a bit frail since her youth and often came for routine checkups. As Inoichi was a close friend to Tsunade, Luka was seen by either herself or Shizune, making sure to give the woman the best care possible. In her universe, despite her frail health, the woman plateaued at a hearty two hundred and twenty pounds, a far-cry from her initial weight of one hundred and ten pounds. The woman had long brown hair that was done in a long braid that cascaded down her back, and had brown eyes. Her skin was as pale as moonlight, another sign of her frail nature. Luka was dressed in a long green casual dress that had begun to hug her generous curves as of late. The woman had a bit of a belly and her hips began to widen. While this was a small gain, it was going in accordance to Tsunade's projections. Adjusting the scale, Shizune saw that the woman had put on twenty pounds.

"Okay, it says one hundred and thirty pounds." Luka nodded as she sat back down on the bench, awaiting any further instructions.

"Oh I know that it isn't the best to put on weight, but I've been feeling much more lively lately. It's like I have more energy in my system." Giving out a light chuckle, the black haired woman patted her own belly, causing it to jiggle under her black robe. As Tsunade had been focusing on the village as a whole, she hadn't much time to personally oversee her gain, but it was fine. After all. midnight feedings were adding onto her figure quite wonderfully.

"Oh nonsense, don't believe those tabloids that say women have to be thin. As long as your healthy, it doesn't matter what size you are. In fact, I've gain forty pounds and I've never been healthier. And all signs show that you're incredibly healthy as well." Luka let out a sigh of relief, glad that her recent gain had not put her health in any danger. It also gave her an excuse to try out those new recipes she had received from Nabiki.

"Well since I've got a bit of time, why not some smalltalk? How's Ino doing?" As Tsunade's partner in fattening the village, she was quite curious on how the young girl was coming along. After all, Sakura had put on ten more pounds since her last weigh in. By the mention of the name Ino, an angry scowl had presented itself on Luka's usual kind face.

"That damn girl! She's on another one of her fad diets again! The ungrateful brat isn't eating any of my cooking that I slave away to make!" screamed Luka, her face becoming more and more red as she seethed through her teeth. Shizune flinched and could have sworn that she saw steam emitting from her head.

"N-Now now, calm down Mrs. Yamanaka. I'm sure Ino has her reasons for a diet..."

"She had no damn reason! That stupid girl is just so stubborn, she can't even see how much she's in love with the Nara boy and then she ends up diluting herself that being even more thin means you're more beautiful!" Finally realizing that she was entering her 'rage-mode' once again, the woman took many deep breaths and settled down. Such anger was unbecoming of a proper lady.

"Um, would it be fine to have either Tsunade or me have a little chat with her?"

"Oh yes, that's is fine. But don't be to harsh on the dear, she is young after all and I recall many of us were fools doing that age. My I recall my first date with my beloved, you wouldn't believe at how nervous he was..." trailed on Luka as she gushed about her youth and her husband's past actions.

The two had been friends since childhood and acted as rivals in many occasions, at times competing for the same guy and trying to one-up each other with various successes in life. It was no surprise that their daughters would become close friends and mirror their rivalries as well. Luka and Hibiki would often go to one of their favorite cafes, so catch up and give each other friendly advice. Seeing Hibiki and her added weight made Luka smile, happy that her friend was looking so healthy.

"Oh Luka dear, its so nice to see you." smiled Hibiki with her slightly rounded cheeks.

"You too Hibiki, you're looking quite amazing." gushed Luka, wishing to attain such a figure. As she was still a tad bit frail, it had been quite difficult to keep up with a larger intake of food.

"Oh you flatter me. And you've been looking well lately." a small blush on her face, Luka was a sucker for flattery, especially from her husband. The pair ordered french onion soup and club sandwiches, something small as dinner was always hearty at their homes. The pair gossiped about their daily lives, talking about the less than bright actions their husbands had committed as of late, others in the village that had gained weight and the advice that they had received from Tsunade and Shizune.

"Oh and I'll tell you, my Sakura has been eating nonstop ever since she made the darling Uzumaki boy her boyfriend. And they are simply lovely together." said Hibiki, giving of a small giggle as she recalled how shy Naruto acted towards Sakura when he first came for dinner. It reminded her so much of Ein when they were younger.

"Hmph, I'll admit I'm jealous. Ino, until a few days ago was on one of her terrible fad diets. It wasn't until a few days ago that Tsunade talked some sense into her. I've never been so grateful to her."

"Well, if you're looking for her to eat a bit more here and there, I know the perfect recipe! I've been using it on Sakura and she's having trouble fitting into her clothes if you get what I mean." said Hibiki, confident that she could aid Luka. Ino, for her part, just rolled her eyes at how Sakura's gut started touching the table the more food she crammed in there. Her best friend's forehead wasn't the largest part about her anymore. No, that would be the rear end she had managed to cram into one of the chairs at her home, fat spilling over the sides. Her gut wasn't far behind though. A month had passed since Nabiki and Luka exchanged recipes and the dinner that followed. Naruto had become a welcome addition to the Haruno household with Nabiki doting over him and Ein teaching him a few techniques that he picked up in all of his years as a shinobi of the village. At the moment, it was a sleepy afternoon in the village. Naruto was in the Haruno kitchen along with Nabiki. The teen was helping her prepare dinner, the older woman inviting the blonde to stay the night over once more. Nabiki had filled out quite nice due to her own wishes and Ein's help. Wearing a green colored dress, with long sleeves and a white apron, her gain was presented nicely. Her belly rolled over her waistline, pushing against the fabric of the shirt. The apron tied around her flabby waist, outline the soft contours of her stomach, making the flesh look all the more alluring. Her legs had grown much thicker, her thighs now touched and her wider hips now swayed with her pace. Her rear nearly caused her green dress to be pushed up, the two cheeks filled with a healthy layer of fat. The older woman's face had rounded out as well, with a double chin and she had fluffier cheeks as well.

"Oh thank you again for helping me out Naruto." said Nabiki as she stood in front of the stove, cooking a few pieces of breaded chicken. Giving a bashful smile, Naruto continued to cut up the vegetables to go with the stew that Nabiki was cooking as well. Naruto had been enjoying himself as of late. While he did get to meet his parents within his mind, being around such a kind family was very comforting to say the least.

"Um, Nabiki, do you mind if I talk to you about something? It's about Sakura and all." said Naruto, a tad bit nervous to be speaking of Sakura in the presence of her mother. One wrong word and he knew that his head would be through the wall in no time flat.

"Of course dear, I'm always willing to give advice about my darling (not so) little daughter. Unless she has been cheating on you! If so I'll tear her a new one!" shouted the older woman as her eyes seemed to go red. Gulping, Naruto felt chills go down his spine. So that was the face of death?

"No, no its nothing like that. I'm just a bit concerned about her weight." Naruto had recalled the past few weeks spending time with his pink haired girl, how she outgrew her shorts, how she would lounge around his house in nothing but a tight white t-shirt and her underwear and how 'affectionate' she had been of late. Naruto didn't mind her weight one bit, in fact, he loved how soft her figure was whenever he was pressed up against her. He was more worried about her health and if there was an underlying problem. Letting out a laugh, Nabiki turned to Naruto, placing his hand on her soft stomach, which caused the blonde to stutter out and grow a rosy tinge on his face.

"Naruto, us Haruno woman were meant to be healthy, its in our blood. So don't worry your cute little head about that anymore, and just focus on make yourselves happy. Of course not too happy, I don't think I'm ready to be a grandmother yet." Trying to laugh at her joke, Naruto felt the 'hidden' intent behind her last words and went back to cutting the vegetables trying to forget about the whole ordeal.

Genma Shiranui joined his two companions outside the Hokage's Mansion. Today was a real bitch, Lady Hokage had herself working to death on this Debugakure case and she wa taking it out on all the jounin who were unlucky enough to be placed on guard duty

"Yeah, she's really P.O.'ed today Aoba." Raido sipped a small cup of water. His head was throbbing already and Tsunade's earlier tounge lashing didn't help, "She threw a file cabinet at me!" Aoba woed over his busted sunglasses, "A FILE CABINET, RAIDO!"

Genma grabbed a paper cup of water himself and joined in on the Kage-Bashing

"That's nothing, just a few minutes ago she stabbed my hand with my own toothpick!" he said, unwrapping a bandaged hand to reveal a very infected stab wound with wood shavings in it.

"I thought something looked different about you!" Raido laughed

"Haha, very funny." Genma mocked, "What's so important about this Debugakure thing anyway?" the bandana wearing jounin crushed the small cup

There was no answer, "Hey guys, I asked-"

"Debugakure claims to be a hidden village, and is doing so without permission from the existing villages." a new voice joined the jounin. Genma looked over nervously to see Shizune, the Hokage's right hand lady

"M-Miss Shizune!" he quickly jumped to attention, "I had no idea you were-"

"Calm down Genma, I'm with you on this one!" the black haired medic-nin sat down heavily, "I'm usually all for Lady Tsunade actually doing her work, but this is just too much! She's working so hard that she's not even eating anymore!"

***


A desk was seen flying out of the topmost floor of the Hokage Mansion followed by a loud roar of frustration from a certain blonde haired sannin. "RRAAAAAGH!!!" her gruff voice echoed throughout the entire village, "THIS IS TOO MUCH!!!" she screeched, "AH, DAMMIT!!" Tsunade realized that she had just thrown out all of her work in that desk, "Genma!! Aoba!! Go get that desk before all the papers fly out!!" she bellowed

She could hear the nervous pitter-patter of grown ninja scurrying off like frightened children at her command. The blonde lay down on a nearby loveseat, God her head hurt so bad!

Why were these ninja impersonating an official hidden village? From what she had gathered, they had a great economy and had striven even since the great ninja war! Tsunade had sent squadron after squadron to infiltrate this "Debugakure", but only about half of them ever came back. From the information that she had gathered, however, Debugakure's namesake was it's incredibly obese ninja. They had special chakra stealing techniques, were surprisingly strong, and their official colors were purple and gray. They proved to be worthy adversaries indeed, they had plagued Tsunade's attention for months. And without any counterattack from the village itself, Tsunade had no idea what to expect from Debugakure! If they launched a surprise attack, they were completely in the dark in regards to how to counter this special chakra absorbing ability!

Combined with the stress of losing perfectly good ninjas by the handful and the tension of not knowing when the enemy will strike, Tsunade hadn't eaten in about three or four days. She had lost a lot of weight (her boobs were unaffected, much to her delight)

Her cheeks were starting to sink in and you could see her ribcage through her skin. Tsunade sighed as she fell asleep...

***


"Wake up."

Tsunade snorted as she awoke abruptly, her brow furrowed with anger. She was having the most wonderful dream about a land of desserts, chowing down on giant Konoha Dumplings, inhaling pounds of chocolates, slurping up gallons and gallons of frosting!

"You awake?"

Tsunade looked around, she was in a jail cell. Perfect.

"Listen to me when I'm talking to you!"

Her gaze traveled over to the massive shadow behind the bars. A fat man, a HUGE man, stood proudly. His gut hung out of his shirt (which only covered his manboobs and a little of the ribcage area) and his face sported an extra chin or two.

Tsunade snorted again, nearly choking with laughter, he looked absolutely ridiculous! "DON'T YOU LAUGH AT ME!" his eye twitched, "You are hereby a captive of the great almighty Debukage!"

"Whatever, I'll just bust out of here and hand your-" Tsunade stopped when she realized that her chakra flow wasn't flowing!

The big man pat his stomach, "You like? It's a special technique to Debugakure, our body mass feeds off of nearby chakra!" he mocked the Hokage as he pointed a fat finger at her. "You bastard!" she yelled, "Do you have ANY idea as to what's going to happen to you AS SOON AS I BREAK OUT OF THIS CAGE?!"

***


Hour four, Tsunade's boredom had reached it's peak. She had tried circulating chakra, but that was no good as long as those guards were around. She tried squeezing through the bars, her boobs just HAD to be so damn big! She even tried desperately digging out of prison, but the floor was made of tile...

It seemed that all Tsunade could do was just wait until someone came around and saved her...

Wait, were those footsteps? Yes! Yes they were! Had someone finally come to save Tsunade?!

No, it was just some guard. Some guard with food. A lot of food...

"Dinner!" He cried jovially, "Soup's on!" in his chubby hands was gripped a tray of very fine foods. Tsunade raised an eyebrow as he approached her cell, "Come on then, it's chow time lady!" the Debugakure Ninja smiled widely as he placed entree after entree inbetween the bars

"Woah woah, what's with all of this food?" Tsunade narrowed her eyes suspiciously, they were trying to fatten her up. Make it harder for her to escape. "It's the Debukage's orders, we're supposed to skimp out on the prisoners' meals... but..." he smiled coyly and slid a box of rice balls through the bars, "You're way too skinny, here, eat these rice patties!" he said as he headed out

Tsunade glared at the food. It almost seemed to glare back. She initially wasn't going to give in to gluttony. But, since she hadn't eaten in a few days...

"Mph... this village is weird..." Tsunade mumbled through her first ball of rice...
15333.title: In Enemy Territory

choices: "I'll... give it some thought..."
"Hell. No."
153332.content:
After begining to eat her first meal in the last several days, the Hokage's guard was called into a backroom by an unfamiliar voice. As soon as he slipped out of sight, Tsunade immediately slammed her fists into the bars surrounding her with all the force she could muster; only to see that the bars had not only wistood her blows, but that her attempt had only succeeded in causing her hands to bleed.

"DAMMIT!" the sannin cursed as she readied another blow. Same results as last time. This was getting her nowhere. Someone must have placed a seal somewhere on the cell that had the same chakra draining effects that it's creators possessed. She just couldn't back her punches up with enough energy to escape.

Tsunade was left to fume in her cell for almost an hour, before the same guard from earlier returned to the room she was currently stuck in.

"The Debukage wishes to see you now," The fat ninja said as he slid a key into the cell's built-in lock. "Don't try anything funny, or you'll be torn to shreds."

The 5th shot the purple clad ninja infront of her a death glare, but quickly realized that it would be more prudent to go along with what they said until she could lay eyes on this so called "Debukage". That way, she could eliminate the renegade village's leader before they became any more of a headache for her.

Tsunade was led down a series of winding passageways. Judging from the complete lack of windows, the Lady of Konoha assumed that she was currently underground somewhere. After about ten agonizing minutes of wanting to break her smug captor's face in two, they finally arrived at a much larger door that had various large animals intricately carved into the woodwork. The guard knocked twice, and the door began to slowly open, revealing a level of wealth and oppulance normally reserved for the most powerful of feudal lords. The entire room had been covered in wood panelling of various kinds; and in each of the far corners of the room, there sat an enormous jade statue of an elephant. Alongside the walls, someone had put int the effort to dig two rather large koi ponds, complete with a surrounding of rocks and local plantlife that was somehow able to be maintained in this underground lair.

None of these impressive things however were what caught Tsunade's attention. What Tsunade was starring at now was the massive woman sitting dead center in the room surrounded by an honor guard of four fat ninja - two male and two female- wearing various animal masks. The large woman motioned for the escorting guard to leave them, before turning to match the sanin's gaze.

"Greetings, my Lady," The sitting woman, who had to atleast be about 400 pounds and looked to be in her late 20's said in a cordial tone. "I appologize that we had to meet under thse conditions, but it seems that there was no other way; as none of our letters or messenger hawks were ever answered."

"that's because your little gang here isn't a real ninja village!" Tsunade yelled as she made a bee-line for the mountain of flesh infront of her.

A chubby kunoichi wearing a boar mask quickly made a series of hand gestures, before slamming her palm into the wood flooring.

"Ninja Art! Demon's Tongue!" the masked ninja yelled as a purple tendril suddenly shot out of the ground and wrapped itself around the charging sannin, stopping her dead in her tracks.

"Thank you, Kasumi," The Debukage nodded to her subordinate, before returning her attention to her whould-be attacker. "Now, now, there is no need for violence here. Although you do have a point- we are not officially recognised as a ninja village by the council of feudal lords. However, if we could prove ourselves to be stronger than our neighbors, I'm sure that they'd begin turning to us whenever they needed someone to do their dirty work."

"And how -ungh!- do you plan on doing that?" The 5th Hokage said as she struggled against the fleshy mass constricting her.

"By going to war, obviously!" The Debukage said with a shrug of her massive shoulders. "If we can conquer one of the minor villages huddling around the Land of Fire, then we're sure to gain recognition."

The obese leader nodded, and the tendril attempting to crush Tsunade began to relax it's grip slightly.

"That's why we needed to get in contact with you so badly, Lady Tsunade, if we can win the backing of one of the major villages, then there would be no way any of the smaller villages could oppose us. What I propose is an alliance between your village and mine in a war against the minor nations. In return for your military and financial support, we would be willing to teach up to a dozen of your top ninja our special techniques, and any land that we aquire may be claimed by you- afterall, we're not in it for territory, we only want prestiege."

"So, my lady," the Debukage said as a toothy smile began to spread across her face. "What do you say?"
153332.title: The Lady of Hunger! A deal to change history!

Shizune decides she'd look better with some curves.
Another reason.

154.title: Shizune

choices: Weeks pass and Shizune is getting pretty chubby.
Three months pass and Shizune get's fat!
1541.content:
Tsunade had gotten fat over the past year, her butt, breasts, thighs, and belly masses of flab that jiggled constantly. Shizune, her loyal assistant, said nothing about this weight, though Tsunade knew Shizune found it highly irresponsible.

With a weight of four hundred pounds, Tsunade was more often than not called the Debukage by some of the meaner adolescents in the village.

But Tsunade didn't care. She loved her fat, she loved the jiggling sensation that went through her every time she moved, and she loved food. Of course she would often stuff her face back when she was skinny but as a fat woman she found food much more enjoyable somehow.

One day, while she watched Shizune come in with a cart of food for her, she noticed Shizune's tired expression. The bags under her eyes and the dangerously skinny frame Shizune had caused concern to flare up within the Hokage.

"Here you go My Lady, enjoy." Bowing, Shizune turned to leave.

"Wait Shizune."

Doing so, Shizune turned around, thinking her boss wanted more food.

"Would you join me for dinner?"

Shizune spared a glance for the massive amounts of highly fattening, greasy, fatty foods heaped on the cart before answering.

"I...will, just this once, you understand."

Tsunade nodded and motioned for her to get two plates for both of them from the cart.

As soon as the first piece of food passed her lips, a donut covered in chocolate frosting, Shizune's eyes widened. It was so good!

Tsunade encouraged her assistant to go back for another plate after she was done with her first. And another, and another, and another until, two hours later...

"Oooooooh...." Shizune moaned. She had managed to eat four full plates of food, her stomach now stuffed tight and poking out slightly from her robes.

Tsunade, who had eaten eight plates, felt full but not stuffed. Hearing another moan from her assistant, Tsunade reached out a flabby hand and placed it on Shizune's stomach.

"What are you...ugh...doing My Lady?"

"You can really put it away, Shizune." Tsunade made gentle, slow, circles with her palm around that taut surface, Shizune moaning a bit from the sensation.

"BURRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAP!"

Shizune's face turned beet red at the loud belch she had just done, Tsunade smirking at her.

"Why Shizune...how unladylike of you!"

"I'm sorry Lady Tsunade...ugh...I'm just so...HIC...full."

"It's good to be this full, isn't it?"

Shizune, her mind half woozy from all the food she'd eaten, responded.

"Yes..."

"Would you like to do this with me, say once or twice a week?"

"I...I...yes...that would be nice. To relax from work and eat."

"Alright, swear to me that we'll do this at least once or more a week from now on."

"I swear...My Lady...goodnight."

Shizune then fell asleep, her stuffed form draping across Tsunade's huge gut.

Tsunade stroked her lovely assistant's hair.

"Goodnight my Shizune-chan..."
1541.title: A fat Tsunade starts feeding Shizune in private.

15411.content:
Weeks had passed since Shizune had agreed to join her boss during dinner and she had dutifully shown up four more times, the latest dinner being tonight.

Entering the Hokage's office, she found Tsunade already there, this time there were two large carts full of food.

"Ah, Shizune, ready to eat?"

"I am...but...aren't I...too big?"

Tsuande shook her head at that and beckoned Shizune closer. The dark haired ninja did so and Tsunade hugged her assistant, opening up Shizune's robe, allowing Shizune's stomach, which was now somewhere between a beer belly and a pot belly, to plop out.

Tsunade then took Shizune's hand and placed it over that belly.

"Feel your fat. Feel how it jiggles under your caress. And you belly isn't the only part that has gotten bigger, Shizune-chan."

Shizune's other hand was then led towards her butt, which had increased in size along with her belly.

"Isn't that a lovely feeling?" Tsunade whispered in her ear.

"Yes...oh Tsunade-sama...it feels wonderful!"

"Then let's eat, and get your butt and belly larger!"

Shizune nodded and the pair tore into the carts.

This time, Shizune managed to eat six plates while Tsunade devoured twelve.

Hiccuping, Shizune hugged her mentor. "I...HIC...love you," she said softly.

Tsunade beamed then and returned the hug.

"I love you as well, Shizune-chan. Need another belly rub?"

Shizune nodded and Tsunade's hand went to her stuffed belly.

Loud belches ripped from Shizune's mouth, Tsunade giggling at each one, causing Shizune's cheeks to turn red each time.

"You're so cute," Tsunade said, kissing her on the forehead.

"I'm glad you think so, Tsunade-sama."

However the two new lovers were cut off by the screen doors sliding open, revealing...

154112.content:
"Hokage, I'm sorry for barging in like this but-" however Ten Ten's apology died in her throat as she saw the obese Hokage kissing the chubby Shizune.

Both lovers broke apart and Tsunade got to her feet, waddling towards Ten Ten.

"What is it?!"

"Ma'am, I'm sorry for bothering you ma'am. It was nothing, I'll just be going now!"

Once Ten Ten was gone, Tsunade sighed.

"She's going to tell everyone! Oh I'm so sorry, My Lady!"

"It's alright Shizune. I don't care who knows. I'm with you and that's all that matters."

With Ten Ten...

Alone in her room, Ten Ten thought about what she just saw.

The two fat women making out had stirred something in the weapons master. Standing before her mirror, Ten Ten puffed out her cheeks and her belly, trying her best to imitate a waddle.

Did she want to be fat herself?

The thought sent a shiver down her spine but it was an excited one.

"Alright, I'll do it! Starting tomorrow it's the birth of a fat me!"

1541121.content:
After a month, Shizune's figure had filled out even more. The now 240 lbs Jounin had taken on a belly-bottom centric shaping. Her breasts had remained unchanged by the added piles of flesh, but her belly, now large and plump went out a whole foot and a half.

Her ass, which looked and felt as if someone had stffed two pillows in her panties, was still much larger. Her thighs were enormous, making her legs look a little wider than half of her height. Even her kancles were laden with fat.

She layed asleep on the 600+lbs of Tsunade's lap, whilst the older woman gazed softly at her and stroked her hair with one hand while she ate a slice of pie with the other. Her seven chins wiggled as she swallowed.

As she reached for another slice of pie, she noticed that she was out. That was when she rang a small bell.

Promptly, the massive Tenten walked in the room, even bigger than Shizune at 312 lbs, a good deal of it went to her mammaries, aside from there, she was all around smaller than Shizune.

"Yes Lady Hokage?" she asked cheerily. She had been hired on as Tsunade's personal assistant to aid Shizune, who mostly slept, ate and cuddled with her "mentor."

"Tenten, could you be a dear and get us four or five more pies?" The titanic woman asked. "I'll let you take your break with us."

"Sure thing ma'am!" Tenten replied before trying to waddle off, then she recalled something. "Oh, and Sakura came by, she'll be up in a minute."

"Oh yes, I'm supposed to train her today..." Tsunade sighed. Walking around and teaching Sakura in the proper environment was becoming a burden. "Tell her to come here, we'll start after our snack."

"Yes ma'am!" Tenten replied, when Shizune awoke.

"Tsunade-chan? Is that you?" Shizune inquired yawning, to earn herself a giggle.

"Yes it is Shizune-chan...Did you have a good dream."

"Uh-huh." The raven haired girl said, but before she could continue...

15411211.content:
Sakura couldn't believe how fat her teacher, Shizune, and Ten Ten had gotten in only a month.

During Tsunade's instructions, Sakura watched as Tsunade's fat belly jiggled and her chins wobbled when she talked. Tsunade did a fast medical jutsu, her fat fingers as dexterous as ever, Sakura wondering just how that was even possible.

"Sakura!"

Sakura was jolted out of her observations and looked at Tsunade.

"Something wrong?"

"Um...actually...yes. You three are all far too fat! I mean look at Shizune! Her gut is disgusting! And Ten Ten's breasts are obscene! And you, Sensei, you are the worst! You should be scolding the other two, not turn into a mountain of blubber yourself!" Sakura breathed heavily at that, her passion for her dislike of weight evident.

Tsunade glared at her student and tried her best to comfort the shocked Shizune, who looked like she was about to cry.

Ten Ten seemed to let Sakura's comment pass right through her, waiting to see what Tsunade would do.

Thirty minutes later, a dejected Sakura left the Hokage's office. She was no longer her student.

Feeling more depressed than anything else, Sakura sat down at the ramen stand and ordered a large bowl...

1542.content:
Shizune sighed as she stood before the mirror in her bedroom. The reflection that she saw possessed none of those bountiful curves other female ninja had. Instead Shizune found nothing to delight in.

Later that day, at work, or the pestering of her lady to get actual work done, Shizune brought the subject up to Tsunade.

"I need some curves, don't you think?"

Now Tsunade, who was feeling lazy today on result of a huge hangover, saw a window of opportunity.

"Yeah, you should gain weight."

"Really?"

Tsunade nodded.

"Fat is in right now. If you were, oh, I don't know, one, two, or even three hundred pounds heavier, you'd look stunning!"

"You're serious?"

Tsunade nodded.

"Alright, I think I'll try to gain some weight then!"

"Great! Start right now!"

Shizune, too caught up in the idea that she'd have some curves, nodded, rushing from the room and heading towards the nearest ramen stand.

Tsunade grinned. Now she'd be able to get some rest and not have to put with Shizune's nagging!

"Excuse me..."

The ramen stand manager turned and noticed the slim, dark-haired woman who could only be one person: Shizune, assistant to the Hokage.

"Yes?"

"I'd like twenty bowls of ramen please."

"Having a party?"

But Shizune shook her head, pale cheeks turning a bit red. "They're all for me."

The man, though shocked, didn't make a disparaging remark and instead pointed towards a rather large, empty, table a few feet away.

Shizune thanked the man, paid for her bowls, and waited until the first five were before her.

Taking a gulp, she picked up her chopsticks and dug in...

Two hours later, twenty empty bowls stacked neatly one atop another were all the evidence that remained, other than Shizune's bloated, taut stomach of course.

The dark haired assistant, despite her best efforts, let loose a mighty belch, blushing, but feeling incredibly warm as she touched her turgid belly.

This sensation...she nearly died from it!

She had to have more!

But not right away, of course.

First she had to go check on her lady and ensure that Tsunade was indeed doing work.
15421.title: Shizune stuffs herself at the ramen stand and r...

"No, we didnt know you were coming... and Ino just HAD to have thirds... sorry."
154212.content:
Yes, her irresponsible Lady Hokage should be about due time for a checkup... should be.

She'd missed so much work in these last few hours, there was no telling what kind of shenanigans Tsunade might have been up to in her absence? The whole place could have burned down without dear old stick-in-the-mud Shizune around to keep things in check. But, from what she could make out of the Hokage's Palace just over the rooftops of Konoha, there was no discernible chaos that needed rectifying. No flames, no smoke, no ninja flying in or out of any windows, nor any desks doing the same. Things looked pretty tame inside that building over there...

So maybe another hour or two wouldn't have killed Tsunade?

After all, she had obviously done such a good job of keeping things in line so far. Maybe this was a sign that Shizune needed to loosed up on the older woman's figurative leash a bit?

Not too much of course; but just enough to warrant a little Shizune time of relaxation and peaceful digestion...

***


Shizune plodded her way up the stairs to the Hokage Palace some hour or so later not fully digested. The still-present contents of her stomach bulged outwards in a waterbelly that sloshed and gurgled as it struggled to do away with its maxxed capacity. The flight of stairs certainly wasn't the best thing that Shizune could have done with such a full tummy, and the postpartum stress of getting back to work was just twisting the knife.

No doubt Lady Tsunade was going to be royally upset at her for leaving for so long without notice. Especially if she noticed how full her stomach was; she'd never hear the end of it!

So, taking a deep breath that was part "soothe my indigestion" and even more "lets hope my boss doesn't kill me", Shizune knocked quietly on the door.

"Lady Tsunade..." she squeaked, "I-I'm back from my lunch break!"

Much to her surprise Shizune found that instead of the usual drunken banter or homicidal threats to those interrupting her drinking, the voice behind the door was one of jovial air, joined by two lighter voices sharing the same humor.

"Oh, Shizune come in!" Tsunade said happily from behind the door, "Sakura just made lunch!"

'Lunch?' Shizune asked herself quietly, 'And a late lunch at that. Prepared by Sakura? What's going on here?

Opening the door, trying not to seem put off or conspicuous in any light, Shizune was pleasantly surprised to see that young kunoichi Sakura Haruno and Ino Yamanaka had joined her, an aproned Sakura caught midaction as she gingerly placed a modest chicken dish in front of Tsunade while Ino still sat opposite from her Hokage.

"Oh, well this is nice." Shizune said pleasantly as she approached the desk, "You both decided to join Lady Tsunade for lunch today?"

Sakura, placing a plate down in front of Ino and standing to face Shizune, smiled kindly. "Well normally I'd have lunch with Naruto, but I've gotten into cooking lately and he doesn't eat much of anything that isn't cooked in broth or instant." she said kindly, "So I decided to make Lady Tsunade a meal and see if she liked it."

"She's a natural by the way, Shizune." Tsunade said with a happy smile on her face as she delicately pierced a small piece of chicken with her fork

"And Ino decided to come along too, once I told her that I'd be cooking."

The addressed blonde acknowledged her name with a wily smile, "Well you may not be the best looking girl around, what with that monster forehead of yours, but I'll give you this- my days around the Flower Shop have been made a lot more bearable by those muffins you bring me."

"Quiet Ino-Pig!" Sakura barked back quickly

Shizune noticed something rather odd about Ino in that instance. She couldn't quite place it, but she seemed just a hair's width wider than before. Maybe it was just because she was sitting down- she'd never seen her sit before...

Getting a big whiff of some pre-cooked chicken, Shizune's concerns regarding the Yamanaka girl were quickly cut off at the tail. While the mere thought of more food made her want to vomit, a bigger bust line certainly held lots of appeal that made it well worth the effort...

"Sakura, how long did you say you've been cooking?" Shizune asked politely as she took another deep inhale, "You must have had a lot of practice, your chicken smells great."

Sakura blushed slightly, "Well actually, I only found the cooking book about two weeks ago. But Ino says that I've gotten really good, and now Lady Tsunade's giving me high marks too. I must really be a natural cook after all, huh?" she laughed

Shizune's belly grumbled, not out of hunger but of fear. Fear because it knew the next words to pass from the breast-envious lips of its bearer:

"So, is there any left?" Shizune asked with a slight grimace, "I'd love to see how well you're coming along for myself."

1542121.content:
Sakura smiled warmly at the question and nodded, soon giving Shizune her own plate and waiting for the verdict.

Shizune's stomach roiled at the thought of even more food, but Shizune had gotten herself into this gut-busting mess of her own accord and she would have to get out of it.

Besides, she was genuinely curious about Sakura's new cooking skills.

As she tucked into the chicken, idly observing that her boss was not being very civil in her eating now that the attention was off of her. As she speared a bit of cut chicken with her fork, she brought a bit to her lips and chewed.

"Sakura this is wonderful!"

It was so wonderful, in fact, that Shizune speared an even bigger chunk of the poultry for her next bite.

By the time the chicken had joined her twenty bowls of ramen in her stomach, Shizune was well and truly stuffed.

Ino and Sakura had left, Shizune also noting that Sakura herself looked a tad bigger as well but didn't bring it up. She didn't want to hurt her feelings after all.

Once the two younger women were gone, Tsunade leaned back and let loose an impressive belch, sighing heavily.

"Oh man, that hit the spot!"

Shizune sighed at her mentor's lack of manners, wondering, for the thousandth time, how someone like her was the Hokage. Of course, Tsunade was a fine Hokage, but it was displays like this and her constant sake-binging and gambling, that made Shizune often ponder fate's machinations.

Her pondering, however, was cut off by a belch twice as loud as Tsunade's and one that actually silenced the Hokage for a few moments.

Blushing, stammering out an apology, Shizune made to leave, groaning a bit as she clutched her truly stuffed stomach, when Tsunade stopped her with an imperious glare.

"Stay a moment Shizune."

Nodding, Shizune sat back down and Tsunade got up, moving around her seated assistant with a smirk gracing her features. A hand reached out and prodded the chicken and ramen-filled stomach, eliciting yet another belch from Shizune.

"Someone's really enjoyed themselves for lunch."

"Y-yes my Lady," Shizune said.

"Well good thing, because I've decided that Sakura will serve as our own personal chef from here on out.

Shizune again nodded and finally got to her feet, her mentor helping her steady herself.

"Now Shizune, I want you to take the rest of the day off. Rest and digest, okay?"

Shizune nodded but managed to point a finger at her boss.

"And you make sure you finish the paperwork on your desk, got it?"

Tsunade groaned but nodded, plopping back in her chair and watching as her beloved assistant left the room.

Once she was certain Shizune was gone, Tsunade pulled out the twelve pack of donuts and two jugs of sake she had hidden away in her drawers, eating one of the pastries and slowly, very, very, slowly, getting her paperwork done.
