"I really hope Lady Tsunade enjoys those donuts I made." Sakura said idly as she and Ino strolled down the street together, "I spent all night with my Mom making them."

Ino rolled her eyes in mock intolerance of Sakura's ambitions, "You're such a little brown noser, giving her all those treats like that." she chided playfully, "Lady Tsunade's gonna blow up like a balloon if you try to substitute food for her actually liking you."

"Ino!" Sakura said with a bone shattering jab to her friend's arm, "That was just too far!"

Ino whimpered in pain while at the same time stifling her laughter, "Oh... okay, I'm sorry I'm sorry." she gasped, "But really Sakura you don't have a thing to worry about; I'm sure she's eating one right now for dessert."

"I just hope she doesn't let them get stale..."

"You sound like a worried housewife." Ino snorted, "I'm sure she'll eat them whenever she wants. And if she doesn't, I'm sure she'll spread them around the office. Its not like the Hokage to waste food."

"Ugh, but she put them in her desk... you know how forgetful she is!"

Both girls let out a hearty laugh at their leader's expense. "True, but not as forgetful as you." Ino pointed out, "After all, where were you yesterday afternoon? You said you were going to bring me lunch and you never showed! I guess mentors do start to rub off on their students... good news for your chest."

Another quick punch, "Ow!!"

"I was looking through that cookbook for more advanced recipes, thank you very much!" Sakura said with a huff, "I can't spend all my time just cooking Ino, I have to study these recipes whenever I can if I want to get really good at it."

"So whats with you and this sudden interest in cooking, anyway?" Ino asked, recovering from her recent shoulder blade injury, "I mean, so you found the cookbook, big deal. No reason to aim for Top Chef or anything... not that I'm complaining."

"Well, there's no real reason... I've always liked to cook, but I've never been any good at it." Sakura said modestly, "So I'm coming home from training with Naruto and Sai and it's displayed in an old antique store window. I asked about it, and it was pretty cheap. End of story."

"Looooove Story, you mean." Ino jeered, "Don't lie, you wanna make that spiky haired foxface team mate of yours something special, don'tcha?"

"I-Ino!" Sakura hollered with a heavy blush across her face, "That's totally not it!"

"Suuure its not." Ino said, making a mock kissy face

"I can hit you again, you know."

"Whatever, Sakura." the blonde said dismissively as she began to part from her pinkheaded companion, "This is my stop, dinner should be up in about an hour or so; so I better go ahead and change." walking towards the Yamanaka Flower Shop, Ino turned back, "Don't forget, you promised to make me lunch tomorrow!"

"When?!"

"After you bailed on me yesterday!"

"Ugh, fine." Sakura grumbled, "What do you want Ino-Pig?"

"The works, gimme what you're best at." Ino said vaguely as she started towards the doorway again, "Just come get me before you start at the Hokage's Office, alright?"

"Sure, no problem."

***

Big problem.

No, not Ino's order, that was fine. The real problem was sitting right in front of her. On her bed, over the covers, tossed casually and allowed to flail out and about on her mattress. Her apron, rather the one she borrowed from her mother, was what had upset her.

Pink and white patchwork with a large frontal pocket, it was hard to believe that such a thing could really upset anyone other than a Women's Rights Activist. Yet there, in Sakura's mirror, was the absolute worst mark marring her otherwise flawless reflection. On the sides, where the apron's tied had been strung, were tiny red marks that indicated the worst- it had dug into her side ever so slightly.

It wouldn't have been so bad if she hadn't been wearing the same apron since she started cooking; and not once had it left those horrible impressions around her middle like that.

'I must have put on a little weight...' Sakura thought woefully to herself as she stared at an otherwise flawless and toned reflection in the mirror, 'I have been working with food a lot lately, maybe I've been sampling a little too much...'

When, at the worst possible time (considering that she was topless) the oven timer dinged loudly throughout the Haruno household.

"I got it!" she hollered, hurrying over to the apron and wrapping it around her exposed torso. She rushed down the stairs and into the kitchen, dove into the oven mitt and removed several cookies from the oven for dessert tomorrow. On instinct, to see if they were done, Sakura leaned in slightly to grab at one of the molten confections before pulling back

"No, not tonight." she chided herself aloud, "I've already put on too much weight, I can't afford to get out of shape..."

However the tray beckoned her, called out to her lovingly... it seemed such a waste if they weren't going to get eaten before they were stale...

'I know!' she said thought, reaching for the three preprepared meals and placing them on the counter, 'When they cool, I'll divide this batch up evenly into three; four for Ino, four for Shizune, and four for Lady Tsunade!'

"One, two, three four..." she ran a quick head count, "Damn, thirteen... oh well, I guess Ino's a lucky girl. Maybe she'll shut up about me forgetting about her."
15421212.title: Commission

choices: Ino confronts Sakura about hiding her figure.
Sakura comes through for Tsunade and makes twice as much for dinner that night.
154212121.content:
Sakura shuffled a bit nervously in her chair, the empty plate before her a testament to her nerves, as before it was covered with several cookies, just some treats made from the same recipe she had made the night before. All of them were now residing in her stomach, a stomach that clenched up a bit as she watched the three other women finish their meals.

Ino was the first to finish, followed by Tsunade, both blondes letting out rude belches. Shizune was the last, making sure to appear tidy, despite the fact that this was her third meal of the day, having paid a visit to the ramen stand on her way to work that morning.

Finally, Shizune finished, covering her mouth before smiling warmly at Sakura.

"Delicious. Full marks!"

"Yeah, you did good kid," Tsunade said with a pat to her protruding stomach.

"I guess that Billboard Brow isn't the only thing large about you. Your cooking is amazing!"

Sakura blushed at the praise, her nerves vanishing.

"Oh, it was nothing really..."

"Great, than can you make twice as much for dinner?" Tsunade put in, earning herself a whack on the back of the head from Shizune.

"My Lady!"

"What? I wasn't going to eat all of it. You need to eat more, remember?"

Sakura was about to ask why Shizune needed to eat more when she noticed a bit of her stomach was showing. Frantic, Sakura swiftly covered it up with her hand.

A motion that was not lost on Ino as the Hokage and her assistant continued to quibble.
154212121.title: Lunch the next day is rather eventful: Sakura...

choices: Despite her promise, Shizune's "over" eating becomes her regime through habit!
Sakura's cooking skills are really advancing and her waist is still trim!
1542121212.content:
There is, as with all formal meeting arrangement areas, an equally formal dining hall present in the Hokage's mansion. While usually it is reserved for important meals to be shared with diplomats or other foreign agents, Tsunade was not above hosting a quaint dinner arrangement there for herself and a few guests.

Tonight however it would just be her and Shizune on either end of the long table provided for them, with young Sakura Haruno providing culinary services in the kitchen. This wasn't the first time she had been cordially invited to dine with the Hokage, in fact on Lady Tsunade's lonelier nights the two of them went out drinking together. However she usually preferred to keep an air of formality between the two of them.

She, as usual, was never really one for formalities.

On the other end of the table, already soused to the gills, sat the Fifth Hokage in all of her drunken glory. Apparently an hour before dinner was just enough time and just enough liquor for her to get past tipsy. It was a little off putting for both of her younger assistants; Sakura because she was a rather loud drunk and it made her nervous while she cooked, and Shizune because she actually had to keep conversation with this atrocious alcoholic.

"So Sakura, how much longer till we can start eating?" she asked in a drunken stammer, "I'm starved off my ass, and Shizune's not getting any younger over there!"

"Lady Tsunade!"

"I'm just sayin' your not." the older woman said frankly, "I mean really, you're not. Not getting any younger I mean. I mean, come on I'm starvin' over here!"

Both of the younger women simply sighed; a sure sign that they had grown far too tolerant of this behavior.

"I'm sure Sakura will have things ready for us as soon as possible." Shizune said in a soothing voice, "Right, Sakura?"

"Right!"

"See? Now why don't you calm down..." she cooed, "Have some water."

"Nope. Sake." Tsunade chuckled dimwittedly as she poured and downed another cup. "Looks like water, right?"

"You're hopeless." Shizune said with a light facepalm of shame.

"Dinner's ready!" Sakura said triumphantly as she emerged from the kitchen, stained apron and all as she carried two hearty platters of simplistic peasant dishes. "It's nothing fancy, but I think you'll enjoy the steaks." Walking dutifully over to her Master first, the pinkette laid one of the platters down in front of her, "Just in case you need it, I put some steak sauce in the middle of the table there." now to Shizune, she served the second plate happily, "I made a quick one for Naruto earlier and he said that it would have been better with steak sauce. But then again, he's an idiot. Bon appetite!" she said smiling as she headed for the door

"An' jus' whur do you think you're goin'?" Tsunade asked in her drunken slur

"Um... home?"

"Why Sakura?" Shizune pleaded, "You should stay here with us, you worked so hard on these meals! You should be able to eat too..."

Sakura let out a cautious giggle, "Oh no, I already ate before I came." not a lie, "Besides, I've got late-night training with Kakashi Sensei."

"Oh... well, okay." Shizune said defeatedly. Now she was to be left alone with the buxom blowhard with her lips wrapped around the bottle... and on a full stomach too.

Yes it's true, Shizune had already eaten. Not out of gluttony or out of boredom, but because this whole "not having breasts" thing was really bothering her. Now that some of the girls had developed, she was starting to look petite around the bustline by comparison. Sakura was pretty safe, Ino and Tenten were about equal, but that Hyuuga girl? Talk about blown out of the water!

So, if pain was beauty, then her breasts had better be killer by the time this is over with...

***


"Ughhh..." Tsunade moaned dumbly as she sucked through her teeth, one thoroughly used toothpick pressed between her forefinger and thumb as she leaned back slightly in her chair.

"Mmmm..." Shizune whined as she cradled her inflated paunch. Hard as rock, her tummy pooched out slightly as it swelled in all its occupants. From two days of stuffing herself silly, the younger kunoichi was starting to get the hang of overeating. The exciting sensation that seemed to radiate within her on her very first binge had lost all appeal by this point, however; all being left now was contempt for even the four letter word "food".

"So, I can take that as you enjoyed the meal?" Tsunade asked, her head a little more clear now that there was some food on her stomach

"...No..."

"Oh, why not?" she asked with mild concern, patting her own full tummy in jest, "That girl's got some real talent in the kitchen, I don't see why she hadn't started cooking earlier, she's a natural."

"No... the food was good." Shizune said meekly, "But... my stomach really hurts..."

"Still at this whole "getting breasts" thing, huh?" Tsunade said frankly

"Lady Tsunade!" Shizune chastised out of habit, "Don't be rude!"

"I'm just saying that you're going to hurt yourself if you keep this up." she said, reclining further back into her chair, "That or eat yourself sick. You've really got to be careful with this Shizune, I don't want you developing an eating disorder."

"Lady Tsunade..." Shizune said quietly, feeling awful now that she was making her mentor worry about her, "I-I'll be fine. Promise. No more overeating. I'm just going to research things that are... um, specific to my problem."

"Your problem being small breasts?"

"Yes, Lady Tsunade. Small breasts." Shizune grumbled

"Good." Tsunade said with a huff, reaching over the table to paw at some dumplings Sakura had brought, "If you want, I was always told that bread makes your breasts grow. Worked for me." Tsunade said with a nonchalant bite of her dumpling

"I-I always heard that bread made you gain weight..." Shizune said meekly

"Whatever, I'm never gonna get fat." Tsunade said confidently with another defiant bite of baked bread

Shizune sighed and reached for her things, "I-I should be off for tonight then." she said with a struggled bow to her Master, "Good night Lady Tsunade, sleep well."
1542121212.title: Twice Nightly

choices: Amid her whining, Tsunade notices that Shizune is getting pleasantly plump.
Tsunade's light lunch is large, a side-effect of Shizune's gorging.
15421212121.content:
A few weeks had passed since Shizune's promise to the Hokage.

And the assistant hadn't kept it in the slightest.

Oh she had tried. She had cut back on portions for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. She had stopped buying so many ramen bowls at once and only settled for three or four. She had even skipped a meal once or twice.

But the end result of all these attempts at discipline only resulted in her hitting the food twice as hard the next available meal.

So now, she was starting what was considered a light breakfast these days. Said breakfast consisted of two omelets, three bowls of rice, and two glasses of milk. It filled her but didn't quite take the edge off her hunger, so Shizune stopped by the ramen stand before going to work, smiling warmly at the vendor.

Now no longer feeling hunger gnaw at her insides, Shizune was prepared for her day.

Entering the office, she saw her mistress snoring at her desk, a half-eaten box of pastries right by the currently drooling Hokage.

Sighing the sigh of the long-suffering, Shizune put the box back in one of the many drawers Tsunade had on her desk and wiped up what drool she could before whispering in her lady's ear.

"Lady Tsunade, time to get up."

The only response Shizune got was a grunt/snort combination that made the assistant think of Tonton.

"WAKE UP MY LADY!"

"Whuzzat? Hmmm?"

Tsunade was definitely awake now, blinking rapidly and sniffling a bit as she returned to the world of the wakeful.

"Oh...hey Shizune..."

"Hello. Now here are the latest reports from our jonin currently on assignment. They need to be looked over and stamped by you. Then you have the trade agreement with the Land of Sand, then we'll have a light lunch, then more documents to sign."

Tsunade groaned and placed her forehead on the wood of the desk.

"I really hope this is all a dream!" Tsunade whined.
15421212121.title: Despite her promise, Shizune's "over...

choices: Sakura splits the lunch between herself, Shizune, and Ino at the Flower Shop
Shizune leaves it for Tsunade, hoping for the best...
154212121212.content:
"Sorry my lady, but you're awake."

"Great." Tsunade said miserably as her head once again met the hard surface of the desk. "Ow."

Shizune chuckled silently to herself, trying not to take slight humor from her mentor's plight; she had her own work to be doing, after all. When Tsunade's drinking started, what little paperwork that got done already stopped dead in its tracks, and it was usually her job to resort and file them after one of Tsunade's little drunken episodes in the office. Today however, or rather last night, Tsunade seemed to have behaved herself.

Where papers usually mountained atop the very desk that the ever-elegant Lady Hokage was so brilliantly using as a pillow, lately things had come to less of a "mountain" per say, and more of a "steep hill with several climaxing areas". So naturally when the workload was light, there was much less of a mess for Shizune to pick up afterwords. In fact, the last three Thursdays pertained to almost no mess at all compared to the usual where she had to search for TonTon amongst the stacks. So she couldn't complain when there were only a few files here and there with paper scattered about the floor.

So casually Shizune began skimming the relative area for papers that needed to be resorted into their rightful files, her usual demeanor about her which consisted of a generally positive attitude and a relative mix of toleration, slight admiration and contempt for her lazybones boss. Letting out a slight grunt as she leaned over to pick up a stray (probably very important) document regarding the Sand Village, Shizune could only bear with the seemingly daily wedgies that seemed to plague her lately.

Picking at her underwear from outside her robe, Shizune frowned slightly to herself, consciously putting an effort towards pushing her sudden change in diet from her mind. She simply didn't like to think about the effects of eating such hearty meals and how it might be affecting her girlish figure as it troubled her so. Ironic, considering that this was undoubtedly related to her recent search for curvage.

'Maybe tight undies means that I'm finally getting curvier?' Shizune asked herself meekly, 'But why would it be my panties and not my- no, I'm sure that soon I'll have a bountiful chest just like Lady Tsunade!'

Shizune stood, upset by her straining bottoms, and ran a hand down her middle; it had grown softer, but what could possibly be the problem? She only ate her fill, and she tried to keep her promise to her Hokage by cutting out binge eating in hopes of yielding bigger breasts. Perhaps she would have to cut out a few things? Shizune didn't want to get soft around the middle, only in the chest!

'Oh no... what am I going to do?' she woed once more over her failed attempts at dieting, 'I don't want to gain any more weight, but I have to if I- ... hey, what's that smell?'

And, as if on command, there came a light rapping on the Hokage's door.

"Good morning, Lady Tsunade!" Sakura's voice came cheerful and chirpy through the light doorway, "I thought I'd stop by early today so we could perfect that Liver Transplant procedure we started last Tuesday?"

At the opening of the door, Sakura was shown to have two large platters in her possession, on stacked atop the other wrapped in wax paper. She fumbled slightly with the dishes before placing them down noisily in front of Tsunade, who could only groan miserably to herself at her youngest disciples' noisy entrance. How dare she decide to show up early, carrying noisy plates and knocking so loudly on the door when she knew very well that Thursday was her "I drink alone every Thursday Night" night?!

"Go home, Sakura." Tsunade said bitterly, "No training today. Hokage has a hangover."

A small frown creased Sakura's lips before Shizune intervened

"Lady Hokage, don't be so rude!" the robed woman declared, "the least you could do would be to take her food from her and apologize for staying up all night drinking!"

"It wasn't all night, Shizune." Tsunade grumbled, "It was most of the night. Now both of you scat... I've got to beef up on this foreign policy for the Sand Village..."

Sakura's frown increased, "Oh... well, would you at least like the food?" she asked politely, "I know it's early, but I think it might at least help with your headache if you eat something."

Both women watched as Tsunade, still face down, slid a plate from on top of the other and over within smell range. "Smells good. It'd be a shame if I vomited it up..."

"Lady Tsunade!"

"Don't yell, please."

"I'm just saying its a lot of food." Tsunade said grumpily, "Its not a bad thing, but I'm gonna be really full on top of a hangover."

"She has a point, Sakura." Shizune said, wary of her mentor's weak stomach, "If she eats too much now she may throw up all over her office..."

"But its so much food... I'd hate for it to go to waste."

"Oh God just stop talking and go!"
154212121212.title: Dietary Scrimmage

choices: Shizune is invited out for a night of clubbing with Anko and Kurenai.
Tsunade continues to enjoy Sakura's food and delude herself.
1542121212121.content:
Sakura hurried out of the Hokage's office, followed by Shizune.

Both knew that Tsunade needed her alone time to get over her hangover.

So it was that Shizune found herself at the flower shop, sharing the food with Ino and Sakura. It was a pleasure to observe the joy the younger ninja took in the food, Shizune slightly taken aback at how quickly Ino devoured hers. But she was also surprised at the way Sakura ate hers. It wasn't nearly as refined as the dinner a few nights ago.

Shizune tucked her own meal away and was idly rubbing her stomach before Sakura called her name.

"Oh...sorry...it's just do you have some more food?"

Sakura blinked a bit at that.

"You want more?"

Shizune blushing, nodded.

Sakura's puzzlement soon turned into a wide smile as she left the shop, telling Shizune to wait for a few minutes.

***
"Ugh...damn crappy sake..." Tsunade muttered, waking up and rubbing her temples.

She didn't feel like she was going to vomit, which was good.

So the Hokage pulled out the remainder of her pastry breakfast from earlier in the morning and dug in, not caring how much of mess she made on the documents. Shizune wasn't here after all.

As Tsunade finished, she noticed that her hand met her stomach a lot earlier than it used to.

A closer inspection revealed that the Hokage now had a gut in place of her toned abs. It was stubbornly rolling outwards and resisted all attempts to hide it despite her best efforts.

Eventually, Tsunade just laid back and sighed.

She wasn't fat, just he stomach was.

Yes, she decided, closing her eyes and deciding to take another nap, she wasn't fat, just her stomach...
1542121212121.title: Sakura splits the lunch between herself, Shizun...

choices: In bed, Shizune reflects on the fatter Tsunade and how adorable it was.
Tsunade decides to lay off the sake for a bit but not the bread.
1542121212122.content:
Shizune decided to eat one of the meals herself and placed the other in Tsunade's private chambers, hoping her mistress would eat it at a later date.

But now she had to see to her own meal and soon had it finished, idly running a hand along her stomach. The earlier fear somewhat returned, but it was countered by the joyfully full feeling she had now. Sakura's meals really were the best, as they often didn't send her searching for more food to fully sate herself after eating them.

Shizune sighed happily as she decided that a nap was in order. Because if her Hokage wasn't feeling her best, there wasn't much the assistant could do in her stead that she hadn't already done what with the organizing of the documents, the soothing of tensions the Hokage had insulted during a drunken meeting a few weeks ago, and just generally tidying up the place.

No, Shizune thought, I deserve this nap.
***
When Shizune woke up, it was dark and the Hokage was not in her office chair. Frantic, the assistant got to her feet and started inspecting the other rooms.

Her panic subsided when she opened the door to Tsunade's private chambers and found the Hokage passed out again, alcohol not responsible for once. No, this time the Hokage's sedate form was due to the pasty white belly on display to the whole world, the robes meant to contain said belly lying untied as the Hokage snored loudly.

Despite herself, Shizune giggled, finding the sight adorable.

Moving closer to her sleeping lady, Shizune reached out hand and gently stroked the burgeoning mass that was Tsunade's stomach, surprised at the softness she felt. Of course there was a tautness as well, but the majority of the belly she was feeling was actually fat. Maybe it had been the taste that had laid Tsunade low, as Sakura's meals were exquisite in that regard as well.

Tsunade snorted a bit in-between snores at Shizune's touch but didn't wake up. As Shizune removed her hand from her superior's tubby stomach, she noticed one other detail that made her clamp her hand over her mouth, effectively stopping the loud laughter that wanted to escape: on Tsunade's cheeks, which were quite round, crumbs and sauce stains dominated.

Shaking her head, but smiling, Shizune finally covered up her boss and left the room, sparing one last glance back before she slid the door shut and headed for home.
1542121212122.title: Shizune leaves it for Tsunade, hoping for the b...

choices: Shizune and Sakura rejoin their mentor for lunch...
Ino has become a very different girl back at the Flower Shop. Let's check it out
15421212121222.content:
"Thanks for helping me carry these papers, Sakura."

"Oh no problem, Lady Shizune." Sakura said modestly as she leaned back to better accommodate the admittedly cumbersome stack of work, her strict kunoichi training with her squad keeping her back nice and limber. "Lady Tsunade didn't seem like she was going to be of much help today anyway."

"Today? When is she ever?" Shizune jested playfully at her absent boss' expense, "All she does in that office of hers is drink and not do paperwork."

"Where do these go again?" Sakura interrupted

"Oh, over by the water cooler." Shizune said quickly, her long days of hunching over a desk finding vengeance in making this simple labor unbearable on her back. That and the uncomfortable chafing between her legs made the entire ordeal unbearable. Even though she had realized some weeks ago that there was a problem in her eating, her weight continued to rise as if nothing had happened at all. It was always "I'm starting tomorrow" or "Tomorrow being Thursday" or "When Lady Tsunade gets that stack of paperwork done so I won't be bored in the office."

And of course her waist continued to expand as her overall mass increased ever so slightly. Now sporting a bit of a belly that swelled ever so slightly over the waistband to her... I don't know what you call them, ninja pants? Anyway, the bottoms under her robes hand begun pinching at her softer tummy ever so slightly lately, and where once spacious was starting to get a little tight around her bum. Much to her dismay, she was still wearing the bra from two months ago. Shizune figured that, at least with so much food being eaten, some of the weight might just go to her breasts. But where could it possibly be going? Her stomach? It was squishy sure, but it wasn't quite a belly yet. Her thighs were a little thicker, but that didn't account for how heavy she felt lately... maybe she was just imagining more weight on her body.

As she turned, failing to notice the unaccounted for bulging butt cheeks she had so unknowingly sprouted, she placed her stack down on the floor in front of her. Her crack, almost on fire with another one of those horrible wedgies, was picked at lightly before grunting as she rose.

Sakura, still slender as ever due to her restrictive diet and harsh training regimend, placed her pile of paper down across from Shizune's

"Still, she's been drinking a lot lately." Sakura said worriedly, "Is everything alright?"

"She's fine." Shizune grumbled, "You just haven't been around her long enough to know what "a lot" is. But she promised to stop drinking so much... at least around us."

"Alright." Sakura giggled, "I hope she at least eats the get-well brownies I made her."

Shizune led her younger student out the door of the storage closet, oddly out of place in the Hokage's Mansion, "So, how's your training going with Lady Tsunade anyway?" she asked politely, "All your sessions lately have been private, I haven't gotten to see how much your medical ninjutsu has progressed."

Sakura frowned, "It's been slow. I really only work on my training every other day or so because Lady Tsunade has some new recipe for me to try out."

"Really?" Shizune frowned back, "That's awfully abusive of her."

"No, no, I don't mind." Sakura sighed quietly as she let out a small smile, "In a way, this is what I wanted; my medical training had hit a bit of a stalemate, so I must have been subconsciously looking for a hobby. I found cooking, and now Lady Tsunade is helping me with that too, so either way I still have my mentor."

"Now by helping, you mean she actually cooks with you?" Shizune asks dumbfounded. The mentor she had come to know and fearspect hadn't picked up a kitchen utensil since time immorial.

"Well... no." Sakura says frankly, "But she's always telling me how much I need to add or make, how it tastes or what I did wrong. Between you, her, and Ino I'm going to become the best chef in the Leaf Village by no time!"
15421212121222.title: Substitution

choices: Had made sure to make more lunch, suspecting both women might not be full yet.
Had not made any extra. Shizune makes Tsunade actually teach Sakura something.
154212121212221.content:
"Ah, there you two are!"

Shizune and Sakura were greeted by this cheery salutation as soon as they entered the Hokage's office, noticing two makeshift tables consisting of paperwork with food on top before them.

"Lady Tsunade..." Shizune started to say, a bit surprised at her mentor's creativity. Maybe she actually wanted to get work done during lunch?

"Yes Shizune?"

Tsunade had just taken a big bite of her second of many sandwiches she had requested Sakura make for her lunch that day.

Now, her lady's cheeks bulging as she took another wide bite, Shizune just shook her head.

It wasn't her place to bring up Tsunade's heavily drooping belly or the fact that her rear was starting to really stretch out the back of her robe.

"It's nothing. Let's eat!"

Sakura smiled and sat down to her own meal, declining to eat more after just one plate and instead focused on observing her mentor and her mentor's assistant.

Tsunade was her usual slobby self when it came to eating, not caring about the crumbs dropping onto her desk or the sauce staining her face. The only thing that appeared to matter to the Hokage was when the next piece of food was entering her mouth. Sakura also had noticed the now incredibly prominent belly Tsunade had developed but didn't dare bring it up.

Shizune ate neatly, but occasionally missed wiping a stray crumb from her face. Sakura also noticed that her rear was looking even larger than Tsunade's and her middle was pleasantly plump, not the monstrosity that Tsunade's was becoming.

But above these observations, the greatest thing Sakura felt was joy that her food was being received so warmly by both women.

As the two women finished their meals, Sakura prepared for the two to start a lesson or quibble about paperwork, but instead, both merely looked at their empty plates and then to her.

"Do you cook any more food?" Tsunade asked as blunt as ever.

Shizune, while not saying it, looked hungry also.

Sakura...
154212121212221.title: Shizune and Sakura rejoin their mentor for lunc...

choices: Some time later, Shizune's increasing appetite and weight is somewhat worrying..
Tsunade's newfound uselessness yields newfound appetite and less movement...
1542121212122212.content:

However at this point Shizune cared not that her breasts were still quite under average size for a woman of her impeccable bulk, but that she carried around more than enough weight to satisfy four Shizunes!

And it was all that damned cookbook's fault!

All those mindless meals where she simply stuffed herself silly! Her inability to refuse food from anyone anymore! Her weight problem and all burdens associated with it! The thundering footsteps that followed around her Hokage as she waddled around the office like a hopeless heifer! All on that damndable book!

"Lady Shizune!" Sakura called, "I was just about to pull lunch out, would you like your bag in here or in there today?!"

And it was on instinct that Shizune's reaction was based.

In a snap, all worries were temporarily cleared from her mind. She could suddenly smell whatever it was that must have been in Sakura's bags on the way up to the office much more clearly now, able to pick out the very ingredients used to make today's smorgasbord. She drooled slightly as her mind went blank and her appetite took over, moving one super-thick leg in front of her clumsily as she lumbered towards the door.

"Mmm..." her stomach grumbled loudly, forgetting the impeccable breakfast that Shizune had fed it earlier, "Well I suppose... one more meal wouldn't kill me." she reasoned, "After all, I could always look at that cookbook after lunch... or dinner." she said dimly as she took another step forward, "Or tomorrow. Tomorrow would probably be better."

It was then that Shizune failed to notice her flaring thighs getting dangerously close to the doorway, and where she completely ignored the slight pinch of her massive rear squeezing through.

"Ah, good you're here!" pudgy Sakura said kindly as she smiled, "Are you ready for lunch? I thought we'd go simple and I'd just make some sandwiches today. Tsunade just headed towards the dining hall and Ino should be here soon to join us."

"Oh sure..." Shizune trailed off with a hungry look in her eye, "Sounds good to me..."
154212121212221221111122.title: The Last Ingredient

1542121212122212211111221.content:
Simple was not the word Shizune would use to describe the sandwiches on her plate.

No, simple did not apply to the practically whole-loaves used to create the top and bottom of these monstrosities. Meats of all kinds were scrunched together and doused with a rainbow of condiments, the most prevalent being mayo and a kind that looked more like lard than regular mayonnaise.

And there were forty of the sandwiches on Shizune's plate alone. Sakura's plate held fifteen, Ino's fifty, and Tsunade's a whopping eighty, stacked in layer after layer.

She wanted to speak up, to warn them about what she considered the root of all this softness, but she picked up her first sandwich instead, cramming it deeply into her mouth.

As time passed, the minutes becoming hours, she observed the Hokage finish off all eighty only to demand more, a demand Sakura was happy to supply, pushing twenty onto the Hokage's plate. Tsunade tried to lean down to grab these latest morsels only to be stopped by one of the rolls on her gut. Her fat arms uselessly jiggled as she realized that she couldn't even grab the food in front of her.

Luckiliy, Ino took pity on the Hokage and lifted one to her mouth.

Until Ino's stomach ripped through her shirt, red and taut.

Sakura's own pants split, the pinkette laughing and feeling her sated stomach, pressing hard and burping.

And Shizune?

She was on her back, having leaned back a little too much, her curves biting into the legs of the table.

Panting, Shizune managed only a feeble grasp of her somewhat flabby breasts and groaned.

She had gotten her curves.

They had just come with a lot of rolls.

154212121212221221112.content:
Ino was walking on ahead after dinner, taking in the sights of Kohona at night and enjoying herself.

Behind her, Sakura and Ino's mother walked at a bit slower pace.

"What do you mean thanks for not mentioning it?" Sakura asked.

Ino's mother gave her a steady look at that and patted her own stomach, which had a bit more roundness to it than usual.

"Ino's gain. As you can no doubt see, I've started to put on a few as well, to encourage Ino to do the same."

"But...why?"

"Don't you remember all those crazy fad diets she would put herself through?"

Sakura nodded.

"Those were ruining her figure. Sometimes I could even see her ribs. I should have spoken up then, but now...thankfully...it looks like those unhealthy days are over. I know she's a bit larger but I think having a figure like this will benefit her far more in the long run than being a stick."

"Well I certainly won't bring it up around her. I don't think I've seen her this happy in awhile."

Ino's mother smiled at that and moved on ahead to chat with her daughter, Sakura observing the mother-daughter pairing with a warm smile.

The sight made her realize just how little time she actually spent with her own mother and she decided that she would do something with her before she left for work the next day.

1542121212122212212.content:
Though she did lightly squeeze her increased bust, she did so swiftly and hurried out of the office with Sakura, the pair eager to get away from their lazy mentor.

Eventually, after stopping at a few food stands for Shizune, the pair made their way into Ino's Flower Shop. The blond greeted them warmly, her wider face home to a wider smile as she noticed the bags of food Shizune carried.

"Sakura, did you cook any for me?"

Sakura shook her head and was about to tell her that it wasn't her food when Shizune interjected.

"Now Ino, today is Sakura's day off. She is going to relax, not cook for another person, understand?"

Ino nodded, apologizing to her friend. Sakura accepted the apology and chatted with Ino for a bit.

Her blond friend had indeed gained some weight thanks to her cooking, the pinkette observed. While not as large as either Shizune or Tsunade, Ino was definitely fat.

"Oh, Sakura, I almost forgot. Mom's invited you to dinner tonight. She tried some of those buttered bread rolls you made for me last week and she wants to repay the favor!"

"Sounds fun! I'll definitely be there."

Ino was about to gossip away, as was her wont whenever she and Sakura got together, when she was cut off by a ripping noise.

Both Sakura and Ino looked at Shizune then, seeing the wide rent in the backside of her robe, her fat rear on display as well as her wedged panties.

Shizune had just placed a piece of fried chicken into her mouth when she felt her robe rip.

Her whole body turned red, not wanting to turn around and face the younger women after exposing herself so shamefully, but soon she felt a light tap on her shoulder. Turning around, she saw Sakura's understanding gaze and Ino's still shocked features.

"Don't worry about it Shizune. It...It's nothing."

Shizune smiled weakly at Sakura's attempts at cheering her up when Ino spoke up.

"Yeah, come over to dinner in a bit and my mom can set you up with a big pair of sweats. Apparently they're leftovers from when she was pregnant with me and she got pretty big. I've seen the pictures."
1542121212122212212.title: Shizune finds out the hard way when she splits ...

15421212121222122121.content:
Shizune arrived at Ino's house a few hours later, making sure to hide the rip in her largest robe with a small sash around where the tear was. It wasn't practical, but she had only really needed to hide it for a short bit anyway. Shizune knocked on the door rather nervously, not really knowing quite to expect in Ino's mother.

The door swung open to reveal a pleasantly plump woman, whose hair and eyes matched Ino's almost exactly. "Welcome!" she said. "I assume you are Shizune?"

"Uh... yes, I am. I'm here for..."

"Oh, I know why you're here. Follow me!"

Ino's mother turned around and disappeared into the house, Shizune close behind.

Ino's mother finally turned into a side room. Shizune followed her in, and gasped: The entire room, about 10 feet by 10, was filled with shelves upon shelves of clothes, shoes, and various accessories.

"Impressive, isn't it?" asked Ino's mother. "It's all of the clothing me and Ino have accumulated over the years... and that's quite a lot."

Mrs. Yamanaka bustled over into the far corner, where a trunk sat on it's own. She opened the trunk and grabbed a few items.

"Come over here, Shizune. I want to see how some of these things fit on you."

Shizune made her way over to Mrs. Yamanaka, interested to see what was in the trunk.

"Look at this picture of me, Shizune... you're not quite that big, eh?" giggled Mrs. Yamanaka as she handed Shizune the picture.

Shizune struggled to keep a look of shock off of her face. In the picture, Mrs. Yamanaka was HUGE! She had massive breasts, each the size of a watermelon, a ponderously large gut, obviously her most prominent part, that seemed to be the size of an over-inflated beach ball! Her butt was by no means small, either, having massive butt cheeks the same size as her breasts crammed into her robes.

"Wow..."

"I know, right? I was huge! Now here you go: 5 pairs of sweatpants, a tank top, a sweat shirt, and a few shirts. There are some panties and bras in there, too. Change into something, then join us at the dinner tale when you are done!"

***

Shizune had changed into a set of grey sweatpants and the tank top, and she was pleasantly surprised by the fact that everything was still big for her. Sitting down with Ino and Sakura at the table, they waited expectantly for Ino's mom to finish cooking. And when she finally did, they weren't let down: Each girl got a massive serving of spaghetti, a whole chicken, and a bowl of ramen.

"Mmmph... Wow Mrs. Yamanaka, thish ish great!" said Shizune with a mouth full of food.

"Thank you! And please, just call me Rena."

***

An hour later, and everyone was stuffed to the gills. Sakura and Rena had managed to eat a chicken, 3 plates of spaghetti, 2 bowls of ramen, and a few slices of cake. On the other side of the table, Shizune had just devoured everything in sight... and Ino had matched her plate for plate. They had eaten an entire pot of spaghetti apiece, managed to put away 3 whole chickens, 8 bowls of ramen, and some how still had room for pieces of cake each. Needless to say, they weren't going to be doing much of anything for the next few hours.

"Shizune, will you need a place to stay tonight?" asked Rena casually, knowing full well how difficult it would be to walk on that full stomach.

Shizune blushed fiercely. "Yes please..."

154212121212222.content:
Ino's mother smiled as she entered the shop, reaching out a hand and pinching one of Ino's cheeks. She was overjoyed at how much she could grab in one pinch, clearly a sign that Ino was no longer ruining her figure with those crazy diets. She was actually starting to look like a real woman now, with her sizeable breasts, wider hips, and the aforementioned rounder cheeks.

"Mom, please don't do that in public!" Ino groaned out, swiftly looking around for any patrons who might have seen the motherly display.

Her mother merely snorted at Ino's embarrassment but stopped pinching her daughter's cheek.

"Fine, I just came to see if you wanted to go to lunch."

Ino found herself agreeing quite quickly and swiftly did a sweep of the shop, locked up the register, and made sure the gone for a break sign was clearly visible on the door before leaving with her mother towards one of the nearby food stands.

The pair chatted about everything and nothing until their food arrived, Ino's a hearty helping of barbequed ribs and rice, while her mother had gotten just a simple bowl of soba.

Ino dug into her meal, eating like the pig her mother had named her after and promptly earning herself a swat on her bottom.

"Ino, manners!"

Blushing, Ino slowed down and apologized, earning a smile from her mother.

As Ino ate, she noticed how bland this food was compared to Sakura's.

Sure she finished every last bit of it, but it left her feeling very annoyed, something her mother caught on to.

"Isn't the food good?"

"It's okay, but just okay. Sakura's got this place beat. Didn't you try the cookies she made me?"

"I think they were all gone before I had a chance," Ino's mother commented, poking her daughter's big pot-belly.

Ino blushed even harder at that and hung her head.

"I know I've...gotten chubby...but...but Sakura's food is so good!"

"I'm not upset Ino. I think it's better than starving yourself on those terrible diets. But maybe some moderation wouldn't hurt."

Nodding at her mother's advice, Ino stood up, helping her mother up as well and took her leave, returning to the flower shop with a confident stride.

Moderation.

She could definitely do that!

15421212122.content:
Sakura breathed in the scent of her latest culinary masterpiece: cinnamon rolls, grabbing one for herself and taking a big bite.

The taste was exquisite and she let loose a slight moan, patting her trim waist.

Yes trim, because as worried as Sakura had been about her waist, the extra training sessions with Kakashi had kept any unwanted pounds away from her stomach and waist.

Though, if she was being honest with herself, she did feel a bit more of her backside than usual these days, but it wasn't as disconcerting as a fat belly was.

Besides, maybe she could get more attention from guys with a rounder rump.

A chime rang out then and Sakura's eyes widened.

She still had to finish up the lunch and dinner meals for Tsunade and Shizune and the chime tolling meant she had only forty minutes left!

So, apron at the ready, she became a dervish of the kitchen, working diligently to ensure that her mentor and mentor's assistant would be well-fed for the day.

***
After another hearty dinner, Tsunade leaned back in her chair and smiled warmly at Sakura, patting her stuffed middle.

"Ooof...Sakura once again...fantastic..."

"Thank you sensei!"

Shizune offered her own smile to Sakura, but she had eaten just a tad bit more than her lady, Tsunade challenging her aide to a eating contest halfway through what was, in Tsunade's opinion, a boring conversation.

The aide was happy that she had won and highly amused at the pout Tsunade sported after losing, but it had taken a lot out of her.

But it wasn't painful, like her stuffing a few days ago had been.

No, this filling sensation was almost like the one at the ramen stand that had started her quest for curves.

She hadn't weighed herself or really observed if curves were indeed coming in, deciding to give it a bit more time before allowing Tsunade herself to inspect her for curves.

Now she could just relax, gift Sakura with a content smile, and observe the slightly rounder cheeks and snug pants of Tsunade.

154212122.content:
"Lady..huff...ugh...Tsunade..." Shizune managed to get out, panting heavily as she sat her stuffed body down on the chair beside her mentor.

"Yes Shizune?"

"I...I really can't eat anymore today so I'll have to decline dining with you tonight," Shizune said, gasping a bit after she said this and groaning.

She had somehow managed to eat twenty five bowls of ramen and a hearty helping of lunch from Sakura all in the span of three hours.

Tsunade smirked at the sight of her out-of-breath aide, picking up a slice of pie with her bare hands that was still on her plate. The Hokage herself had eaten her own fair share of food and was pleasantly full but not stuffed to the brim like Shizune was.

"But I can't finish this last slice of pie all by myself. And we wouldn't want to hurt Sakura's feelings now, would we?"

"No...no Tsunade but I...ooooooh!"

Shizune moaned again and didn't even try to hold back the belch that escaped her lips a few moments later.

Tsunade's free hand started roving around Shizune's stuffed gut, poking a bit here, pinching there.

"I feel more room in this belly of yours."

Shizune couldn't respond, only blearily blink at her boss as Tsunade's free hand cupped her chin.

"Now be a dear and open that mouth of yours Shizune. You'll like this pie, I know it."

Then the pie was carefully, but firmly, shoved into Shizune's mouth, the assistant somehow managing to chew and swallow, sweat pouring down her face as she did so.

"There, was that so bad?" Tsunade said with a teasing lilt, rubbing Shizune's gut.

Shizune just belched again and closed her eyes, praying that sleep would let her stomach rest.
154212122.title: Shizune's finding it a little hard to keep ...

choices: Tsunade's prayers are answered as her stomach suddenly rumbles. She's hungry.

1542122.content:
"Well I wouldn't have had thirds if someone hadn't eaten the whole cake they'd promised she'd share with me yesterday!" Ino grumbled, poking Sakura's middle, which was only the tiniest bit softer.

"Ino-Pig!" Sakura growled but Shizune raised her hands.

"It's alright. No need to get upset with one another. I had a big lunch anyway."

A belch rang out then, drawing their attention to the Hokage, who had managed to eat her chicken in less time than it did to bring it to her desk. Of course Tsunade didn't apologize for the belch and had no shame in doing such acts in public, as shown by her wild drinking episodes and her prolific gambling addiction.

"Lady Hokage!" Shizune reprimanded.

Tsunade shrugged her shoulders at the scolding. "Better out than in." Turning to Sakura, she smiled warmly at her apprentice. "Thank you for the great meal Sakura. Would you mind making lunch for the next few days?"

Sakura shook her head, bowing deeply and showing off the pudge unknowingly but none of the other women made a comment.

"I would be honored."

"Good. Evening classes are cancelled for tonight, so go have some fun with Ino here, alright?"

Sakura nodded and soon left, dragging Ino with her.

Once the Hokage and her assistant were alone, Tsunade smiled warmly at her still-digesting assistant.

"You really enjoyed yourself, huh Shizune?"

"Um...yes...do you think that was enough to grant me a womanly figure?"

"No, I don't think so. You'll need to eat a lot more, get some meat on those bones of yours, understand?"

"Yes...but now we have work to do."

"But Shizune..." Tsunade whined, pouting a bit.

But Shizune remained firm even in the face of that, if she was being completely truthful, adorable pout. "No wheedling your way out anymore. Get to work!"

Tsunade huffed and started the mountain of paperwork, glancing over at Shizune to find that her digesting assistant was watching her like a hawk.

Groaning, Tsunade truly paid attention to her paperwork, wishing for a distraction....

info.brief_description: The girls of Naruto gain a bit of weight/grow...as well among other things!
info.description:
Okay. Naruto's females, be they good, bad or inbetween start to gain for any reason, as well as grow taller as a side effect, whether they go hand in hand, or the girls just get fat or giant is up to you. Also, inflation is acceptable.

Rules: No scat, vore, swearing death, gore, tg, Male expansion, guy/guy and if tfs are included, make them partial...I have a whole other interactive for that.

Feel free to also make characters from other anime/manga like Pokemon, Rosario + Vampire, DBZ, etc. cameo, but they'd have to be adapted into ninja form, as well as be approved by me. They'd also have to accompany whichever character you chose initially.

So far that's it...have fun!
